movies.title: Abduction
movies.shortDescription: A thriller centered on a young man who sets out to uncover the truth about his life after finding his baby photo on a missing persons website.

movies.title: Abraham Lincoln: Vampire Hunter
movies.shortDescription: Abraham Lincoln, the 16th President of the United States, discovers vampires are planning to take over the United States. He makes it his mission to eliminate them.

movies.title: Air Force One
movies.shortDescription: Hijackers seize the plane carrying the President of the United States and his family, but he - an ex-soldier - works from hiding to defeat them.

movies.title: Alexander
movies.shortDescription: Alexander, the King of Macedonia and one of the greatest military leaders in the history of warfare, conquers much of the known world.

movies.title: Alex Cross
movies.shortDescription: A homicide detective is pushed to the brink of his moral and physical limits as he tangles with a ferociously skilled serial killer who specializes in torture and pain.

movies.title: Amazing Spiderman
movies.shortDescription: After Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically altered spider, he gains newfound, spider-like powers and ventures out to solve the mystery of his parents mysterious death.

movies.title: Amazing Spiderman 2
movies.shortDescription: When New York is put under siege by Oscorp, it is up to Spider-Man to save the city he swore to protect as well as his loved ones.

movies.title: American Sniper
movies.shortDescription: Navy SEAL sniper Chris Kyles pinpoint accuracy saves countless lives on the battlefield and turns him into a legend. Back home to his wife and kids after four tours of duty, however, Chris finds that it is the war he cant leave behind.

movies.title: Anonymous
movies.shortDescription: The theory that it was in fact Edward De Vere, Earl of Oxford, who penned Shakespeares plays. Set against the backdrop of the succession of Queen Elizabeth I and the Essex rebellion against her.

movies.title: Armageddon
movies.shortDescription: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is going to impact Earth in less than a month, N.A.S.A. recruits a misfit team of deep core drillers to save the planet.

movies.title: A-Team
movies.shortDescription: A group of Iraq War veterans looks to clear their name with the U.S. military, who suspect the four men of committing a crime for which they were framed.

movies.title: Bad Boys
movies.shortDescription: Two hip detectives protect a murder witness while investigating a case of stolen heroin.

movies.title: Bad Boys 2
movies.shortDescription: Two loose-cannon narcotics cops investigate the flow of Ecstacy into Florida.

movies.title: Batman
movies.shortDescription: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being the clownishly homicidal Joker.

movies.title: Batman Forever
movies.shortDescription: Batman must battle Two-Face and The Riddler with help of an amourous psychologist and a young circus acrobat who becomes his sidekick, Robin.

movies.title: Batman Begins
movies.shortDescription: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his war on crime to free the crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption that the Scarecrow and the League of Shadows have cast upon it.

movies.title: Batman: Dark Knight
movies.shortDescription: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, the caped crusader must come to terms with one of the greatest psychological tests of his ability to fight injustice.

movies.title: Batman: Dark Knight Rises
movies.shortDescription: When Bane, a former member of the League of Shadows, plans to continue the work of Ras al Ghul, the Dark Knight is forced to return after an eight year absence to stop him.

movies.title: Black Hawk Down
movies.shortDescription: 123 elite U.S. soldiers drop into Somalia to capture two top lieutenants of a renegade warlord and find themselves in a desperate battle with a large force of heavily-armed Somalis.

movies.title: Bonnie and Clyde
movies.shortDescription: Based on the true story of Clyde Barrow, a charismatic convicted armed robber who sweeps Bonnie Parker, an impressionable, petite, small-town waitress, off her feet, and the two embark on one one of most infamous bank-robbing sprees in history.

movies.title: Bourne Identity
movies.shortDescription: A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and regain his memory.

movies.title: Bourne Supremacy
movies.shortDescription: When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive.

movies.title: Bourne Ultimatum
movies.shortDescription: Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless CIA official and his agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer.

movies.title: Bourne Legacy
movies.shortDescription: An expansion of the universe from Robert Ludlums novels, centered on a new hero whose stakes have been triggered by the events of the previous three films.

movies.title: Braveheart
movies.shortDescription: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier who tried to rape her, William Wallace begins a revolt and leads Scottish warriors against the cruel English tyrant who rules Scotland with an iron fist.

movies.title: Brick Mansions
movies.shortDescription: An undercover Detroit cop navigates a dangerous neighborhood thats surrounded by a containment wall with the help of an ex-con in order to bring down a crime lord and his plot to devastate the entire city.

movies.title: Bring It On
movies.shortDescription: A champion high school cheerleading squad discovers its previous captain stole all their best routines from an inner-city school and must scramble to compete at this years championships.

movies.title: Bring It On Again
movies.shortDescription: When new students cant get onto their college cheerleading team, they form their own squad and prepare for a cheer off.

movies.title: Bring It On All Or Nothing
movies.shortDescription: A transfer student to a rough high school tries joining the cheer-leading squad and she not only faces off against the head cheerleader, but against her former school in preparation for a cheer-off competition.

movies.title: Bring It On In It To Win It
movies.shortDescription: Southern California high school senior Carson arrives at the all-important Cheer Camp Nationals determined to lead her squad, the West High Sharks, to victory. But chic New Yorker Brooke and her team, the East High Jets, are equally steadfast in their pursuit of the competitions coveted Spirit Stick. As tension mounts between the two rival squads, Carson falls for fellow cheerleader Penn, not realizing hes a Jet.

movies.title: Bring It On Fight to the Finish
movies.shortDescription: Lina Cruz is a tough, sharp-witted Latina cheerleader from East L.A. who transfers to a posh, West Los Angeles high school after her widowed mother remarries a wealthy man and Lina not only finds herself a fish-out-of-her-environment at her new high school but she faces off against Avery, the snobbish and ultra-competitive all-star cheer-leading captain to qualify for a spot on her new schools cheer-leading team with the help of her new sheltered stepsister, Skylar, and her former teammates whom she calls up to help her.

movies.title: Bulletproof Monk
movies.shortDescription: Based on the very underground comic book, a Tibetan monk becomes a mentor to a young street kid whom he can teach to protect a scroll.

movies.title: Bullet to the Head
movies.shortDescription: After watching their respective partners die, a New Orleans hitman and a Washington D.C. detective form an alliance in order to bring down their common enemy.

movies.title: Captain America: The First Avenger
movies.shortDescription: Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a Super-Soldier serum. But being Captain America comes at a price if he attempts to take down a war monger and a terrorist organization.

movies.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
movies.shortDescription: Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world and battles a new threat from old history: the Soviet agent known as the Winter Soldier.

movies.title: Catwoman
movies.shortDescription: A shy woman, endowed with the speed, reflexes, and senses of a cat, walks a thin line between criminal and hero, even as a detective doggedly pursues her, fascinated by both of her personas.

movies.title: Charlies Angels
movies.shortDescription: Three women, detectives with a mysterious boss, retrieve stolen voice-ID software, using martial arts, tech skills, and sex appeal.

movies.title: Charlies Angels: Full Throttle
movies.shortDescription: The Angels investigate a series of murders which occur after the theft of a witness protection profile database.

movies.title: Cliffhanger
movies.shortDescription: A botched mid-air heist results in suitcases full of cash being searched for by various groups throughout the Rocky Mountains.

movies.title: Conan the Barbarian
movies.shortDescription: A vengeful barbarian warrior sets off to get his revenge on the evil warlord who attacked his village and murdered his father when he was a boy.

movies.title: Copland
movies.shortDescription: The sheriff of a suburban New Jersey community populated by New York City policemen slowly discovers the town is a front for mob connections and corruption.

movies.title: Crimson Tide
movies.shortDescription: On a US nuclear missile sub, a young first officer stages a mutiny to prevent his trigger happy captain from launching his missiles before confirming his orders to do so.

movies.title: Crocodile Dundee
movies.shortDescription: An American reporter goes to the Australian outback to meet an eccentric crocodile poacher and invites him to New York City.

movies.title: Crocodile Dundee 2
movies.shortDescription: Australian outback expert protects his New York love from gangsters whove followed her down under.

movies.title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
movies.shortDescription: Two warriors in pursuit of a stolen sword and a notorious fugitive are led to an impetuous, physically skilled, adolescent noblemans daughter, who is at a crossroads in her life.

movies.title: Daredevil
movies.shortDescription: A man blinded by toxic waste which also enhanced his remaining senses fights crime as an acrobatic martial arts superhero.

movies.title: Dead Man Down
movies.shortDescription: In New York City, a crime lords right-hand man is seduced by a woman seeking retribution.

movies.title: Dead Presidents
movies.shortDescription: A Vietnam vet adjusts to life after the war while trying to support his family, but the chance of a better life may involve crime and bloodshed.

movies.title: Die Hard 2: Die Harder
movies.shortDescription: John McClane, officer of the N.Y.P.D. and hero of the Nakatomi Hostage Crisis, attempts to avert disaster as rogue military officials seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.

movies.title: Die Hard 3: With a Vengeance
movies.shortDescription: John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon Gruber in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building.

movies.title: Die Hard 4: Live Free or Die Hard
movies.shortDescription: John McClane and a young hacker join forces to take down master cyber-terrorist Thomas Gabriel in Washington D.C.

movies.title: Die Hard 5: A Good Day to Die Hard
movies.shortDescription: John McClane travels to Russia to help out his seemingly wayward son, Jack, only to discover that Jack is a CIA operative working undercover, causing the father and son to team up against underworld forces.

movies.title: Django Unchained
movies.shortDescription: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

movies.title: Doom
movies.shortDescription: Space Marines are sent to investigate strange events at a research facility on Mars but find themselves at the mercy of genetically enhanced killing machines.

movies.title: Dredd
movies.shortDescription: In a violent, futuristic city where the police have the authority to act as judge, jury and executioner, a cop teams with a trainee to take down a gang that deals the reality-altering drug, SLO-MO.

movies.title: Dukes of Hazzard
movies.shortDescription: Cousins Bo and Luke Duke, with a little help from their cousin Daisy and Uncle Jesse, egg on the authorities of Hazzard County, Boss Hogg and Sheriff Coltrane.

movies.title: Eagle Eye
movies.shortDescription: Jerry and Rachel are two strangers thrown together by a mysterious phone call from a woman they have never met. Threatening their lives and family, she pushes Jerry and Rachel into a series of increasingly dangerous situations, using the technology of everyday life to track and control their every move.

movies.title: Elektra
movies.shortDescription: Elektra the warrior survives a near-death experience, becomes an assassin-for-hire, and tries to protect her two latest targets, a single father and his young daughter, from a group of supernatural assassins.

movies.title: End of Days
movies.shortDescription: At the end of the century, Satan visits New York in search of a bride. Its up to an ex-cop who now runs an elite security outfit to stop him.

movies.title: End Of Watch
movies.shortDescription: Shot documentary-style, this film follows the daily grind of two young police officers in LA who are partners and friends, and what happens when they meet criminal forces greater than themselves.

movies.title: Enemy of the State
movies.shortDescription: A lawyer becomes a target by a corrupt politician and his NSA goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a serious politically motivated crime.

movies.title: Escape Plan
movies.shortDescription: When a structural-security authority finds himself set up and incarcerated in the worlds most secret and secure prison, he has to use his skills to escape with help from the inside.

movies.title: Face Off
movies.shortDescription: To foil an extortion plot, an FBI agent undergoes a face-transplant surgery and assumes the identity of a ruthless terrorist. But the plan backfires when the same criminal impersonates the cop with the same method.

movies.title: Fantastic Four
movies.shortDescription: A group of astronauts gain superpowers after a cosmic radiation exposure and must use them to oppose the plans of their enemy, Doctor Victor Von Doom.

movies.title: Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer
movies.shortDescription: The Fantastic Four learn that they arent the only super-powered beings in the universe when they square off against the powerful Silver Surfer and the planet-eating Galactus.

movies.title: The Fast and the Furious
movies.shortDescription: Los Angeles police officer Brian OConnor must decide where his loyalties really lie when he becomes enamored with the street racing world he has been sent undercover to destroy.

movies.title: The Fast and the Furious: 2 Fast 2 Furious
movies.shortDescription: Brian OConner and childhood friend Roman Pearce are re-united by the FBI to bring down a Miami drug exporter in exchange for clear records.

movies.title: The Fast and the Furious 3: Tokyo Drift
movies.shortDescription: A teenager becomes a major competitor in the world of drift racing after moving in with his father in Tokyo to avoid a jail sentence in America.

movies.title: The Fast And Furious 4
movies.shortDescription: Brian OConner, now working for the FBI in LA, teams up with Dominic Toretto to bring down a heroin importer by infiltrating his operation.

movies.title: The Fast and the Furious 5: Fast 5
movies.shortDescription: Dominic Toretto and his crew of street racers plan a massive heist to buy their freedom while in the sights of a powerful Brazilian drug lord and a dangerous federal agent.

movies.title: The Fast and the Furious 6
movies.shortDescription: Hobbs has Dominic and Brian reassemble their crew to take down a team of mercenaries: Dominic unexpectedly gets convoluted also facing his presumed deceased girlfriend, Letty.

movies.title: Fast Getaway
movies.shortDescription: A lighthearted tail about a gang of bank robbers who fall out and split up. The brains of the gang is a boy who, with his father, successfully continue their crime spree.

movies.title: Fast Getaway 2
movies.shortDescription: A former robber (whose partner was his father) has reformed and is now running an insurance business with his girlfriend. An ex-partner frames him for a burglary.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.shortDescription: An insomniac office worker looking for a way to change his life crosses paths with a devil-may-care soap maker and they form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more...

movies.title: From Paris with Love
movies.shortDescription: In Paris, a young employee in the office of the US Ambassador hooks up with an American spy looking to stop a terrorist attack in the city.

movies.title: Game of Death
movies.shortDescription: Secret Ops agent Marcus is sent to Detroit to take out an arms dealer and the head of the hedge fund that is financing him. His CIA backup has other plans and turns on him and its a fight to survive in a hospital.

movies.title: Getaway
movies.shortDescription: To save his kidnapped wife, Brent Magna must drive at the orders of a mysterious man.

movies.title: Ghostrider
movies.shortDescription: Stunt motorcyclist Johnny Blaze gives up his soul to become a hellblazing vigilante, to fight against power hungry Blackheart, the son of the devil himself.

movies.title: Ghostrider: Spirit of Vengeance
movies.shortDescription: As Johnny Blaze hides out in Eastern Europe, he is called upon to stop the devil, who is trying to take human form.

movies.title: GI Joe: The Rise of Cobra
movies.shortDescription: An elite military unit comprised of special operatives known as G.I. Joe, operating out of The Pit, takes on an evil organization led by a notorious arms dealer.

movies.title: GI Joe: Retaliation
movies.shortDescription: The G.I. Joes are not only fighting their mortal enemy Cobra; they are forced to contend with threats from within the government that jeopardize their very existence.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.shortDescription: When a Roman general is betrayed and his family murdered by an emperors corrupt son, he comes to Rome as a gladiator to seek revenge.

movies.title: Godzilla (1998)
movies.shortDescription: An enormous, radioactively mutated lizard runs rampant in Manhattan.

movies.title: Godzilla (2014)
movies.shortDescription: The worlds most famous monster is pitted against malevolent creatures who, bolstered by humanitys scientific arrogance, threaten our very existence.

movies.title: Green Hornet
movies.shortDescription: Following the death of his father, Britt Reid, heir to his fathers large company, teams up with his late dads assistant Kato to become a masked crime fighting team.

movies.title: Green Lantern
movies.shortDescription: A test pilot, Hal Jordan, is granted an alien ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers that inducts him into an intergalactic police force, the Green Lantern Corps.

movies.title: Green Street Hooligans
movies.shortDescription: A wrongfully expelled Harvard undergrad moves to London, where he is introduced to the violent underworld of football hooliganism.

movies.title: Guest
movies.shortDescription: A soldier introduces himself to the Peterson family, claiming to be a friend of their son who died in action. After the young man is welcomed into their home, a series of accidental deaths seem to be connected to his presence.

movies.title: Half Past Dead
movies.shortDescription: This movie tells the story of a man who goes undercover in a hi-tech prison to find out information to help prosecute those who killed his wife. While there he stumbles onto a plot involving a death-row inmate and his $200 million stash of gold.

movies.title: Half Past Dead 2
movies.shortDescription: Former WWE and WCW World Champion Bill Goldberg and hip-hop group Tha Dog Pounds Ricardo Kurupt Brown push life to the limit in this explosive sequel to the 2002 hit movie Half Past Dead.

movies.title: Harsh Times
movies.shortDescription: A tough-minded drama about two friends in South Central Los Angeles and the violence that comes between them.

movies.title: Hercules (2014)
movies.shortDescription: Having endured his legendary twelve labors, Hercules, the Greek demigod, has his life as a sword-for-hire tested when the King of Thrace and his daughter seek his aid in defeating a tyrannical warlord.

movies.title: Hitman
movies.shortDescription: A gun-for-hire known only as Agent 47 hired by a group known only as The Organization is ensnared in a political conspiracy, which finds him pursued by both Interpol and the Russian military as he treks across Russia and Eastern Europe.

movies.title: Homefront
movies.shortDescription: A former DEA agent moves his family to a quiet town, where he soon tangles with a local meth druglord.

movies.title: Hostage
movies.shortDescription: A failed police negotiator turned small town cop, must save the lives of a family held hostage, which draws him into a much more dangerous situation.

movies.title: Independence Day
movies.shortDescription: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy. Fighting superior technology, Mans best weapon is the will to survive.

movies.title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark
movies.shortDescription: Archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the US government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis.

movies.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
movies.shortDescription: After arriving in India, Indiana Jones is asked by a desperate village to find a mystical stone. He agrees, and stumbles upon a secret cult plotting a terrible plan in the catacombs of an ancient palace.

movies.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
movies.shortDescription: When Dr. Henry Jones Sr. suddenly goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, eminent archaeologist Indiana Jones must follow in his fathers footsteps and stop the Nazis.

movies.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
movies.shortDescription: Famed archaeologist/adventurer Dr. Henry Indiana Jones is called back into action when he becomes entangled in a Soviet plot to uncover the secret behind mysterious artifacts known as the Crystal Skulls.

movies.title: Jack Reacher
movies.shortDescription: A homicide investigator digs deeper into a case involving a trained military sniper who shot five random victims.

movies.title: James Bond: Casino Royale (2006)
movies.shortDescription: James Bond: Armed with a licence to kill, Secret Agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007 and must defeat a weapons dealer in a high stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, but things are not what they seem.

movies.title: James Bond: Quantum of Solace
movies.shortDescription: James Bond descends into mystery as he tries to stop a mysterious organization from eliminating a countrys most valuable resource. All the while, he still tries to seek revenge over the death of his love.

movies.title: Karate Kid (2010)
movies.shortDescription: Work causes a single mother to move to China with her young son; in his new home, the boy embraces kung fu, taught to him by a master.

movies.title: Karate Kid (1984)
movies.shortDescription: A handyman/martial arts master agrees to teach a bullied boy karate and shows him that there is more to the martial art than fighting.

movies.title: Kill Bill Volume 1
movies.shortDescription: The Bride wakens from a four year coma. The child she carried in her womb is gone. Now she must wreak vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her a team she was once part of.

movies.title: Kill Bill Volume 2
movies.shortDescription: The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd and the treacherous, one eyed Elle.

movies.title: King Kong
movies.shortDescription: In 1933 New York, an overly ambitious movie producer coerces his cast and hired ship crew to travel to mysterious Skull Island, where they encounter Kong, a giant ape who is immediately smitten with leading lady Ann Darrow

movies.title: Killers
movies.shortDescription: A vacationing woman meets her ideal man, leading to a swift marriage. Back at home, however, their idyllic life is upset when they discover their neighbors could be assassins who have been contracted to kill the couple.

movies.title: Knight and Day
movies.shortDescription: A young woman gets mixed up with a disgraced spy who is trying to clear his name.

movies.title: The Last Action Hero
movies.shortDescription: With the help of a magic ticket, a young film fan is transported into the fictional world of his favorite action film character.

movies.title: Man Of Steel
movies.shortDescription: Clark Kent, one of the last of an extinguished race disguised as an unremarkable human, is forced to reveal his identity when Earth is invaded by an army of survivors who threaten to bring the planet to the brink of destruction.

movies.title: The Myth
movies.shortDescription: Archeologist Jack keeps having reoccurring dreams of a past life, where he is the great General Meng Yi, whom is sworn to protect a Korean Princess named OK-soo. Jack decides to go investigate everything with his friend William.

movies.title: Murder By Numbers
movies.shortDescription: Two gifted high school students execute a perfect murder then become engaged in an intellectual contest with a seasoned homicide detective.

movies.title: Miami Vice
movies.shortDescription: Based on the 1980s TV action/drama, this update focuses on vice detectives Crockett and Tubbs as their respective personal and professional lives become dangerously intertwined.

movies.title: Machete
movies.shortDescription: After being set up and betrayed by the man who hired him to assassinate a Texas Senator, an ex-Federale launches a brutal rampage of revenge against his former boss.

movies.title: Machete Kills
movies.shortDescription: The U.S. government recruits Machete to battle his way through Mexico in order to take down an arms dealer who looks to launch a weapon into space.

movies.title: Max Payne
movies.shortDescription: Coming together to solve a series of murders in New York City are a police detective whose family was slain as part of a conspiracy and an assassin out to avenge her sisters death. The duo will be hunted by the police, the mob, and a ruthless corporation.

movies.title: Mr. and Mrs. Smith
movies.shortDescription: A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other.

movies.title: No Good Deed
movies.shortDescription: An unstable escaped convict terrorizes a woman who is alone with her two children.

movies.title: National Treasure
movies.shortDescription: A historian races to find the legendary Templar Treasure before a team of mercenaries.

movies.title: National Treasure 2: Book of Secrets
movies.shortDescription: Benjamin Gates must follow a clue left in John Wilkes Booths diary to prove his ancestors innocence in the assassination of Abraham Lincoln.

movies.title: No Country for Old Men
movies.shortDescription: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

movies.title: Non Stop
movies.shortDescription: An air marshal springs into action during a transatlantic flight after receiving a series of text messages that put his fellow passengers at risk unless the airline transfers $150 million into an off shore account.

movies.title: Once Upon a Time in Mexico
movies.shortDescription: Hitman El Mariachi becomes involved in international espionage involving a psychotic CIA agent and a corrupt Mexican general.

movies.title: The Outlaw Josey Wales
movies.shortDescription: A Missouri farmer joins a Confederate guerrilla unit and winds up on the run from the Union soldiers who murdered his family.

movies.title: The One
movies.shortDescription: A sheriffs deputy fights an alternate universe version of himself who grows stronger with each alternate self he kills.

movies.title: Oceans 11
movies.shortDescription: Danny Ocean and his eleven accomplices plan to rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously.

movies.title: Oceans 12
movies.shortDescription: Daniel Ocean recruits one more team member so he can pull off three major European heists in this sequel to Oceans 11.

movies.title: Oceans 13
movies.shortDescription: Danny Ocean rounds up the boys for a third heist, after casino owner Willy Bank double crosses one of the original eleven, Reuben Tishkoff.

movies.title: Olympus Has Fallen
movies.shortDescription: Disgraced former Presidential guard Mike Banning finds himself trapped inside the White House in the wake of a terrorist attack; using his inside knowledge, Banning works with national security to rescue the President from his kidnappers.

movies.title: Panic Room
movies.shortDescription: A divorced woman and her diabetic daughter take refuge in their newly purchased houses safe room, when three men break in, searching for a missing fortune.

movies.title: Pompeii
movies.shortDescription: A slave turned gladiator finds himself in a race against time to save his true love, who has been betrothed to a corrupt Roman Senator. As Mount Vesuvius erupts, he must fight to save his beloved as Pompeii crumbles around him.

movies.title: The Rock
movies.shortDescription: A mild mannered chemist and an ex con must lead the counterstrike when a rogue group of military men, led by a renegade general, threaten a nerve gas attack from Alcatraz against San Francisco.

movies.title: Real Steel
movies.shortDescription: In the near future, robot boxing is a top sport. A struggling promoter feels hes found a champion in a discarded robot.

movies.title: Red Dawn
movies.shortDescription: A group of teenagers look to save their town from an invasion of North Korean soldiers.

movies.title: Reasonable Doubt
movies.shortDescription: A District Attorney has his life turned upside down when hes involved in a hit and run and another man is arrested for his crime and charged with murder.

movies.title: Runner Runner
movies.shortDescription: When a poor college student who cracks an online poker game goes bust, he arranges a face to face with the man he thinks cheated him, a sly offshore entrepreneur.

movies.title: Rover
movies.shortDescription: 10 years after a global economic collapse, a hardened loner pursues the men who stole his only possession, his car. Along the way, he captures one of the thieves brother, and the duo form an uneasy bond during the dangerous journey.

movies.title: Spiderman
movies.shortDescription: When bitten by a genetically modified spider, a nerdy, shy, and awkward high school student gains spider like abilities that he eventually must use to fight evil as a superhero after tragedy befalls his family.

movies.title: Spiderman 2
movies.shortDescription: Peter Parker is beset with troubles in his failing personal life as he battles a brilliant scientist named Doctor Otto Octavius.

movies.title: Spiderman 3
movies.shortDescription: A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge.

movies.title: Speed
movies.shortDescription: A young cop must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.

movies.title: Speed 2
movies.shortDescription: A computer hacker breaks into the computer system of the Seabourn Legend cruise liner and sets it speeding on a collision course into a gigantic oil tanker.

movies.title: Stolen
movies.shortDescription: A former thief frantically searches for his missing daughter, who has been kidnapped and locked in the trunk of a taxi.

movies.title: Special Investigation Squad (S.I.S.)
movies.shortDescription: The Special Investigation Squad, an elite secret police force, hunts down criminals in the streets of Los Angeles.

movies.title: The Set Up
movies.shortDescription: Charlie Thorpe, a security systems expert, gets caught during a robbery. When he is released from jail he is hired by a bank owner to design a fool proof system during the refurbishing of a bank. But shortly after its finished he is blackmailed into cracking the security.

movies.title: Sherlock Holmes: Game of Shadows
movies.shortDescription: Sherlock Holmes and his sidekick Dr. Watson join forces to outwit and bring down their fiercest adversary, Professor Moriarty.

movies.title: Showtime
movies.shortDescription: A spoof of buddy cop movies where two very different cops are forced to team up on a new reality based T.V. cop show.

movies.title: Shutter Island
movies.shortDescription: In 1954, U.S. Marshal Teddy Daniels is investigating the disappearance of a murderess who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane and is presumed to be hiding nearby.

movies.title: Switch

movies.title: Blue Jasmine

movies.title: Bounty Hunter
movies.shortDescription: A bounty hunter learns that his next target is his ex-wife, a reporter working on a murder cover-up. Soon after their reunion, the always-at-odds duo find themselves on a run-for-their-lives adventure.

movies.title: Breakfast Club
movies.shortDescription: Five high school students, all different stereotypes, meet in detention, where they pour their hearts out to each other, and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.

movies.title: Bride Wars
movies.shortDescription: Two best friends become rivals when they schedule their respective weddings on the same day

movies.title: Bridesmaids
movies.shortDescription: Competition between the maid of honor and a bridesmaid, over who is the brides best friend, threatens to upend the life of an out-of-work pastry chef.

movies.title: Bridget Jones Diary
movies.shortDescription: A British woman is determined to improve herself while she looks for love in a year in which she keeps a personal diary.

movies.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
movies.shortDescription: After finding love, Bridget Jones questions if she really has everything shes dreamed of having.

movies.title: Bruce Almighty
movies.shortDescription: A guy who complains about God too often is given almighty powers to teach him how difficult it is to run the world.

movies.title: Bruno
movies.shortDescription: Flamboyant Austrian fashionista Brüno takes his show to America.

movies.title: Campaign
movies.shortDescription: An incumbent congressman embroiled in personal scandal faces a no-holds-barred challenge from a naive newcomer funded by two unscrupulous billionaire lobbyist brothers.

movies.title: Change up
movies.shortDescription: Dave is a married man with two kids and a loving wife, and Mitch is a single man who is at the prime of his sexual life. One fateful night while Mitch and Dave are peeing in a fountain, lightning strikes and they switch bodies.

movies.title: Chosen One
movies.shortDescription: A man finally finds faith in himself after the rest of world puts its faith in him; the sole being on earth who can save mankind from its own destruction - The Chosen One.

movies.title: Clerks

movies.title: Clerks 2

movies.title: Click
movies.shortDescription: A workaholic architect finds a universal remote that allows him to fast-forward and rewind to different parts of his life. Complications arise when the remote starts to overrule his choices.

movies.title: Cop Out

movies.title: Couples Retreat

movies.title: Daddy Day Care

movies.title: Dead Before Dawn

movies.title: Delivery Man

movies.title: Dick
movies.shortDescription: Story of two girls who wander away from a White House tour and meet President Nixon.

movies.title: The Dictator

movies.title: Dinner for Schmucks
movies.shortDescription: When he finds out that his work superiors host a dinner celebrating the idiocy of their guests, a rising executive questions it when hes invited, just as he befriends a man who would be the perfect guest.

movies.title: Dirty Girl

movies.title: Dodgeball

movies.title: Dogma

movies.title: Drinking Buddies

movies.title: Dude, Wheres My Car?
movies.shortDescription: Two potheads wake up after a night of partying and cannot remember where they parked their car.

movies.title: Dumb and Dumber

movies.title: Dumb and Dumber To

movies.title: Duplex

movies.title: Eight Legged Freaks

movies.title: Elf

movies.title: Empire Records

movies.title: Employee of the Month

movies.title: Ernest Saves Christmas

movies.title: EuroTrip
movies.shortDescription: Dumped by his girlfriend, a high school grad decides to embark on an overseas adventure in Europe with his friends.

movies.title: Evan Almighty

movies.title: Evolution

movies.title: Family Stone

movies.title: Filth

movies.title: Fire With Fire

movies.title: Fred Claus

movies.title: Funny People

That is until Dick (Jim Carrey) loses his job shortly after getting a promotion that convinced his wife Jane (Téa Leoni) to quit her job. The money is gone, and the house ends up in foreclosure. Dick decides to turn to a hilarious life of crime to pay the bills with his lovely wife by his side.

movies.title: Gabriel Iglesias: The Fluffy Movie

movies.title: George of the Jungle

movies.title: Get Him to the Greek

movies.title: Get Smart

movies.title: Get The Gringo

movies.title: Goonies

movies.title: Grandmas Boy

movies.title: Great Outdoors

movies.title: Groundhog Day

movies.title: Happy Gilmore

movies.title: Heart Breakers

movies.title: The Heat

movies.title: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York

movies.title: Home Alone 3

movies.title: Home Alone: Holiday Heist

movies.title: I Do But I Dont

movies.title: Inbetweeners 2

movies.title: Joneses

movies.title: Jawbreaker

He shares the potion with his friend, Diane, and together they embark on a scientific evaluation that gets out of hand.

movies.title: Legally Blonde 2: Red, White, and Blonde

movies.title: Life As We Know It

movies.title: The Losers

movies.title: Lethal Weapon

movies.title: Lethal Weapon 2

movies.title: Lethal Weapon 3

movies.title: Lethal Weapon 4

movies.title: Marmaduke

movies.title: Meet Bill

movies.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop

movies.title: Meet the Parents

movies.title: Meet the Parents 2: Meet the Fockers

movies.title: Meet the Parents 3: Little Fockers

movies.title: My Super Ex-Girlfriend

But in order to enjoy high heels, adult conversation, and food not served in a bag, they need their husbands to watch the kids for a few hours ... what could go wrong?

Michael J. Fox plays Scott,the younger brother,in his movie debut.

movies.title: Million Ways to Die in the West

But when a vengeful ghost terrorizes the small town, the city boy recruits Becca, a badass local bartender, to solve the mystery of the spirit threatening everyones lives.

movies.title: Nightmare Before Christmas
movies.shortDescription: Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but doesn't quite understand the concept.

movies.title: National Security

movies.title: Van Wilder: Freshman Year

movies.shortDescription: A young Chicago advertising executive believes a woman he sees in a cafe is his long lost love. His conviction leads to obsession, as he puts his life on hold to trail her.

movies.title: Wish Upon a Star
movies.shortDescription: A younger sister wishes to switch places with her popular older sister and the two bickering siblings awaken to find the wish has come true.

movies.title: Wolf of Wall Street
movies.shortDescription: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

movies.title: You Got Served
movies.shortDescription: In order to achieve their dream of opening a recording studio, two friends (Omarion, Houston) must first win their citys dance contest a fierce competition that pits them against a group of tough street dancers.

movies.title: Youve Got Mail
movies.shortDescription: Two business rivals hate each other at the office but fall in love over the internet.

movies.title: Zero Theorem
movies.shortDescription: A hugely talented but socially isolated computer operator is tasked by Management to prove the Zero Theorem: that the universe in the end returns to nothing.

movies.title: The Bucket List
movies.shortDescription: Two terminally ill men escape from a cancer ward and head off on a road trip with a wish list of to dos before they die.

movies.title: Coldwater
movies.shortDescription: A teenage boy is sent to a juvenile reform facility in the wilderness. As we learn about the tragic events that sent him there, his struggle becomes one for survival with the inmates, counselors, and the retired war colonel in charge.

movies.title: Katy Perry: The Prismatic World Tour
movies.shortDescription: THE PRISMATIC WORLD TOUR is a sensory explosion of eye popping theatrics and infectious pop tracks that secured Perrys place as one of the most captivating performers.

movies.title: Boyhood
movies.shortDescription: The life of Mason, from early childhood to his arrival at college.

movies.title: Chasing Ghosts
movies.shortDescription: Lucas Simons, an 11 year old filmmaker, is obsessed with death after the loss of his brother. When Lucas accidentally captures a mysterious presence in one of his films, he inadvertently becomes a YouTube phenomenon, and must learn to live life in the spotlight while also learning how to once again start living life to its fullest.

movies.title: Flowers in the Attic: Seeds of Yesterday
movies.shortDescription: The Sheffield family reveal and go through some home truths as their middle child inherits the Foxworth mansion. The familys ghosts looming over, and more tragedies are in store as the curse lives on.

movies.title: Love Sick
movies.shortDescription: The story of Charlie Darby, who has everything going for him: a great job, friends, family, the whole package. The one thing Charlie doesnt have is love, because every time he gets close, he goes clinically insane. When he meets the perfect girl, Charlie must overcome his psychosis to claim his chance at true love.

movies.title: The Usual Suspects
movies.shortDescription: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which begin when five criminals meet at a seemingly random police lineup.

movies.title: 50 Shades of Grey
movies.shortDescription: Literature student Anastasia Steeles life changes forever when she meets handsome, yet tormented, billionaire Christian Grey.

movies.title: The Giver
movies.shortDescription: In a seemingly perfect community, without war, pain, suffering, differences or choice, a young boy is chosen to learn from an elderly man about the true pain and pleasure of the real world.

movies.title: Atlas Shrugged Part 1
movies.shortDescription: Railroad executive Dagny Taggart and steel mogul Henry Rearden form an alliance to fight the increasingly authoritarian government of the United States.

movies.title: Atlas Shrugged Part 2
movies.shortDescription: Railroad owner Dagny Taggart and steel mogul Henry Rearden search desperately for the inventor of a revolutionary motor as the U.S. government continues to spread its control over the national economy.

movies.title: The Runner
movies.shortDescription: In the aftermath of the 2010 BP oil spill, an idealistic but flawed politician is forced to confront his dysfunctional life after his career is destroyed in a sex scandal.

movies.title: Cleveland Abduction
movies.shortDescription: A single mother who becomes the first victim of kidnapper Ariel Castro finds herself trapped in his home for 11 years, where she eventually becomes a friend and sister to two other women who are taken captive by Castro.

movies.title: Atlas Shrugged Part 3
movies.shortDescription: Approaching collapse, the nations economy is quickly eroding. As crime and fear take over the countryside, the government continues to exert its brutal force against the nations most productive who are mysteriously vanishing; leaving behind a wake of despair. One man has the answer. One woman stands in his way. Some will stop at nothing to control him. Others will stop at nothing to save him. He swore by his life. They swore to find him. Who is John Galt?

movies.title: Of Girls and Horses
movies.shortDescription: Alex, a 16-year-old dropout, starts an internship on a farm and gradually connects with the horses. When a stuck-up teen arrives for a vacation, they initially dislike each other, but a friendship forms.

movies.title: Wild
movies.shortDescription: Driven to the edge by the loss of her beloved mother (Laura Dern), the dissolution of her marriage and a headlong dive into self destructive behavior, Cheryl Strayed (Reese Witherspoon) makes a decision to halt her downward spiral and put her life back together again. With no outdoors experience, a heavy backpack and little else to go on but her own will, Cheryl sets out alone to hike the Pacific Crest Trail; one of the countrys longest and toughest through trails.

movies.title: Me Before You
movies.shortDescription: A girl in a small town forms an unlikely bond with a recently paralyzed man shes taking care of.

movies.title: Dirty Dancing
movies.shortDescription: Spending the summer at a Catskills resort with her family, Frances "Baby" Houseman falls in love with the camps dance instructor, Johnny Castle.

movies.title: Stand By Me
movies.shortDescription: After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.

movies.title: Finding Neverland
movies.shortDescription: The story of J.M. Barrie's friendship with a family who inspired him to create Peter Pan.

movies.title: World According to Garp
movies.shortDescription: Based on the John Irving novel, this film chronicles the life of T S Garp, and his mother, Jenny. Whilst Garp sees himself as a serious writer, Jenny writes a feminist manifesto at an opportune time, and finds herself as a magnet for all manner of distressed women.

movies.title: Pretty Baby
movies.shortDescription: A teenage girl lives as a prostitute in New Orleans in 1917.

movies.title: Free State of Jones
movies.shortDescription: A disillusioned Confederate army deserter returns to Mississippi and leads a militia of fellow deserters, runaway slaves, and women in an uprising against the corrupt local Confederate government.

movies.title: Mothers Day
movies.shortDescription: Interwoven stories of what it is to be a mom seen through the lens of photographer Rigby Gray.

movies.title: Boulevard
movies.shortDescription: A devoted husband in a marriage of convenience is forced to confront his secret life.

movies.title: Strangerland
movies.shortDescription: A family finds their dull life in a rural outback town rocked after their two teenage children disappear into the desert, sparking disturbing rumors of their past.

movies.title: Money Monster
movies.shortDescription: Financial TV host Lee Gates and his producer Patty are put in an extreme situation when an irate investor takes over their studio.

movies.title: The Surface
movies.shortDescription: Two strangers, both at the end of their rope, suddenly meet in the middle of the unpredictable waters of Lake Michigan.

movies.title: Demolition
movies.shortDescription: A successful investment banker struggles after losing his wife in a tragic car crash. With the help of a customer service rep and her young son, he starts to rebuild, beginning with the demolition of the life he once knew.

movies.title: Honey 3: Dare to Dance
movies.shortDescription: While attending college in Cape Town, Melea Martin feels constrained by the schools strict policies, and decides to set out on her own.

movies.title: Flashdance
movies.shortDescription: A Pittsburgh woman with two jobs as a welder and an exotic dancer wants to get into ballet school.

movies.title: Accidentally Engaged
movies.shortDescription: When unsuccessful actress Clarissa returns to her hometown for a wedding and tries to impress her old friends by claiming shes dating big time celebrity Chas Hunter, she suddenly finds herself in a comically false engagement when her lies go public and Chas decides to join the festivities in a stunt to escape bad press.

movies.title: Hidden Figures
movies.shortDescription: Based on a true story. A team of African American women provide NASA with important mathematical data needed to launch the program's first successful space missions.

movies.title: Lolita
movies.shortDescription: A man marries his landlady so he can take advantage of her daughter.

movies.title: Edge of Seventeen
movies.shortDescription: High school life gets even more unbearable for Nadine when her best friend, Krista, starts dating her older brother.

movies.title: Snowden
movies.shortDescription: The NSAs illegal surveillance techniques are leaked to the public by one of the agency's employees, Edward Snowden, in the form of thousands of classified documents distributed to the press.

movies.title: Dear Diary I Died
movies.shortDescription: After the supposed suicide of her sister, a fledgling actress goes to college to try and prove the death was murder. As she investigates, she uncovers a blackmail racket but becomes a murder suspect herself.

movies.title: Before I Fall
movies.shortDescription: February 12 is just another day in Sams charmed life, until it turns out to be her last. Stuck reliving her last day over one inexplicable week, Sam untangles the mystery around her death and discovers everything she's losing.

movies.title: Personal Shopper
movies.shortDescription: A personal shopper in Paris refuses to leave the city until she makes contact with her twin brother who previously died there. Her life becomes more complicated when a mysterious person contacts her via text message.

movies.title: Lost City of Z
movies.shortDescription: A true life drama, centering on British explorer Col. Percival Fawcett, who disappeared while searching for a mysterious city in the Amazon in the 1920s.

movies.title: Wakefield
movies.shortDescription: A mans nervous breakdown causes him to leave his wife and live in his attic for several months.

movies.title: Book of Henry
movies.shortDescription: With instructions from her genius sons carefully crafted notebook, a single mother sets out to rescue a young girl from the hands of her abusive stepfather.

movies.title: The Healer
movies.shortDescription: A young man discovers suddenly to have the gift of healing. Trying to understand it and the new reality that it offers, a teenage girl with terminal cancer unexpectedly will show him the way.

movies.title: November Criminals
movies.shortDescription: A teenager takes on his own investigation of a murder in Washington D.C.

movies.title: Pitch Perfect
movies.shortDescription: Beca, a freshman at Barden University, is cajoled into joining The Bellas, her schools all girls singing group. Injecting some much needed energy into their repertoire, The Bellas take on their male rivals in a campus competition.

movies.title: Pitch Perfect 2
movies.shortDescription: After a humiliating commando performance at The Kennedy Center, the Barden Bellas enter an international competition that no American group has ever won in order to regain their status and right to perform.

movies.title: Glass Castle
movies.shortDescription: A young girl comes of age in a dysfunctional family of nonconformist nomads with a mother whos an eccentric artist and an alcoholic father who would stir the childrens imagination with hope as a distraction to their poverty.

movies.title: A Dogs Purpose
movies.shortDescription: A dog looks to discover his purpose in life over the course of several lifetimes and owners.

movies.title: Wonder
movies.shortDescription: Based on the New York Times bestseller, WONDER tells the incredibly inspiring and heartwarming story of August Pullman, a boy with facial differences who enters fifth grade, attending a mainstream elementary school for the first time.

movies.title: The Gateway
movies.shortDescription: A particle physicist grieving over the loss of her husband in a car crash travels to a parallel world to find him again, with dire consequences for her family.

movies.title: Beautiful Creatures
movies.shortDescription: Ethan longs to escape his small Southern town. He meets a mysterious new girl, Lena. Together, they uncover dark secrets about their respective families, their history and their town.

movies.title: Bedtime Stories
movies.shortDescription: A hotel handymans life changes when the lavish bedtime stories he tells his niece and nephew start to magically come true.

movies.title: Blade
movies.shortDescription: A half-vampire, half-mortal man becomes a protector of the mortal race, while slaying evil vampires.

movies.title: Blade 2
movies.shortDescription: Blade forms an uneasy alliance with the vampire council in order to combat the Reaper vampires who feed on vampires.

movies.title: Blade Trinity
movies.shortDescription: Blade, now a wanted man by the FBI, must join forces with the Nightstalkers to face his most challenging enemy yet: Dracula

movies.title: Bloodrayne
movies.shortDescription: In the Eighteenth Century, Rayne is the half-human half-vampire Dhampir and the lead attraction in a carnivals freak-show in Romania. When she escapes, she meets a fortuneteller that tells that her mother was raped by the king of the vampires Kagan and she decides to destroy her father. In her journey for revenge, she meets Vladimir and Sebastian, the leaders of the fortress of vampire hunters Brimstone, and she joins their society. She seeks for powerful talismans to defeat Kagan, while the skilled warriors Vladimir and Sebastian train her to face the forces of Kagan and her human side falls in love with Sebastian.

movies.title: Blood: The Last Vampire
movies.shortDescription: A vampire named Saya, who is part of covert government agency that hunts and destroys demons in a post-WWII Japan, is inserted in a military school to discover which one of her classmates is a demon in disguise.

movies.title: Brothers Grimm
movies.shortDescription: Will and Jake Grimm are traveling con-artists who encounter a genuine fairy-tale curse which requires true courage instead of their usual bogus exorcisms.

movies.title: Chronicle
movies.shortDescription: Whilst attending a party, three high school friends gain superpowers after making an incredible discovery underground. Soon, though, they find their lives spinning out of control and their bond tested as they embrace their darker sides.

movies.title: City of Ember
movies.shortDescription: For generations, the people of the City of Ember have flourished in an amazing world of glittering lights. But Embers once powerful generator is failing ... and the great lamps that illuminate the city are starting to flicker.

movies.title: Clash of the Titans
movies.shortDescription: Perseus, mortal son of Zeus, battles the minions of the underworld to stop them from conquering heaven and earth.

movies.title: Constantine
movies.shortDescription: Constantine tells the story of irreverent supernatural detective John Constantine, who has literally been to hell and back.

movies.title: Coraline
movies.shortDescription: An adventurous girl finds another world that is a strangely idealized version of her frustrating home, but it has sinister secrets.

movies.title: Corpse Bride
movies.shortDescription: When a shy groom practices his wedding vows in the inadvertent presence of a deceased young woman, she rises from the grave assuming he has married her.

movies.title: Donnie Darko
movies.shortDescription: A troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a large bunny rabbit that manipulates him to commit a series of crimes, after narrowly escaping a bizarre accident.

movies.title: Donovans Echo
movies.shortDescription: A series of uncanny déjà vu events force a man to re-examine his tragic past, memory, instinct, and future.

movies.title: Dungeons and Dragons
movies.shortDescription: Profion, a tyrant, attempts to overthrow a peaceful kingdom ruled by a tough empress.

movies.title: Dungeons and Dragons 2: Wrath of the Dragon God
movies.shortDescription: Dungeons and Dragons 2 takes you deeper into the dark and fantastical world of this fantasy epic. When the evil sorcerer Damodar braves a perilous whirlwind vortex to steal the elemental black orb he declares a sinister plan of vengeance against the kingdom of Ismir.

movies.title: Dungeons and Dragons 3: Book of Vile Darkness
movies.shortDescription: Consumed by hatred for the living, Nhagruul sold his soul to the demon Lords of the abyss so that his malign spirit would survive. In an excruciating ritual, Nhagrulls skin was flayed into pages, his bones hammered into a cover, and his diseased blood became the ink to pen a book most vile.

movies.title: Edward Scissorhands
movies.shortDescription: An uncommonly gentle young man, who happens to have scissors for hands, falls in love with a beautiful girl.

movies.title: Ella Enchanted
movies.shortDescription: Ella is under a spell to be constantly obedient, a fact she must hide from her new step-family in order to protect the prince of the land, her friend for whom shes falling.

movies.title: Enchanted
movies.shortDescription: A princess, who is prepared to be wed, is sent away to New York by an evil queen, where she falls in love with a lawyer.

movies.title: Eragon
movies.shortDescription: In his homeland of Alagaesia, a farm boy happens upon a dragons egg -- a discovery that leads him on a predestined journey where he realized hes the one person who can defend his home against an evil king.

movies.title: Ever After
movies.shortDescription: The real story of Cinderella. A refreshing new take on the classic fairy tale.

movies.title: Ewoks: The Battle for Endor
movies.shortDescription: The army of the Marauders, led by by King Terak and the witch Charal attack the Ewoks village. The parents and the brother of Cindel all die in this attack.

movies.title: Fairytale: A True Story
movies.shortDescription: Two children in 1917 take a photograph, believed by some to be the first scientific evidence of the existence of fairies. Based on a true story.

movies.title: Flight of the Navigator
movies.shortDescription: In 1978, a boy is moved 8 years into the future and has an adventure with the alien ship that is responsible for that.

movies.title: Gabriel
movies.shortDescription: GABRIEL tells the story of an archangel who fights to bring light back to purgatory - a place where darkness rules - and save the souls of the citys inhabitants.

movies.title: Golden Compass
movies.shortDescription: In a parallel universe, young Lyra Belacqua journeys to the far North to save her best friend and other kidnapped children from terrible experiments by a mysterious organization.

movies.title: Great Ghost Rescue
movies.shortDescription: Young Humphrey is a ghost with a big problem. He and his family, the Craggyfords, have been ousted from their home and left without a place to haunt.

movies.title: Halloweentown
movies.shortDescription: Marnie, Dylan, and Sophie Piper have their first out of many adventures! On Halloween, while Marnie is arguing with her mother Gwen, the kids grandmother Aggie comes to visit. Aggie wants to start Marnies witch training before her 13th birthday or Marnie will lose her powers forever. But there is another reason for Aggies visit. Something dark and evil is growing in Halloweentown and Aggie wants help to defeat it.

movies.title: Halloweentown 2: Kalabars Revenge
movies.shortDescription: The Cromwell clan split their time between the real world and Halloweentown, but the son of an old rival threatens to make the latter real and the real world a place of monsters.

movies.title: Halloweentown High
movies.shortDescription: Marnie is a teenage witch living with her family of supernatural beings in the village of Halloweentown. Marnie and her pals are interested in attending high school in the nearby mortal community, where theyll be able to spend more time with kids their age, and with the help of her grandmother Aggie, shes able to convince the town council to go along with the suggestion. However, theres a catch -- if anything dangerous happens as a result of their presence in the mortal school, Marnie and her friends will lose their magical talents.

movies.title: Halloweentown: Return to Halloweentown
movies.shortDescription: Marnie and Dylan are going to follow their dreams to go to college, at Halloweentown University, which is also known as Witch University.

movies.title: Hancock
movies.shortDescription: Hancock is a superhero whose ill considered behavior regularly causes damage in the millions. He changes when one person he saves helps him improve his public image.

movies.title: Hansel and Gretal: Witch Hunters
movies.shortDescription: Hansel and Gretel are bounty hunters who track and kill witches all over the world. As the fabled Blood Moon approaches, the siblings encounter a new form of evil that might hold a secret to their past.

movies.title: Harry and the Hendersons
movies.shortDescription: Returning from a hunting trip in the forest, the Henderson familys car hits an animal in the road. At first they fear it was a man, but when they examine the body they find its a bigfoot. They think its dead so they decide to take it home (there could be some money in this..). As you guessed, it isnt dead. Far from being the ferocious monster they fear Harry to be, hes a friendly giant.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerers Stone
movies.shortDescription: Rescued from the outrageous neglect of his aunt and uncle, a young boy with a great destiny proves his worth while attending Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
movies.shortDescription: Harry ignores warnings not to return to Hogwarts, only to find the school plagued by a series of mysterious attacks and a strange voice haunting him.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
movies.shortDescription: Its Harrys third year at Hogwarts; not only does he have a new Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher, but there is also trouble brewing. Convicted murderer Sirius Black has escaped the Wizards Prison and is coming after Harry.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
movies.shortDescription: Harry finds himself mysteriously selected as an under-aged competitor in a dangerous tournament between three schools of magic.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
movies.shortDescription: With their warning about Lord Voldemorts return scoffed at, Harry and Dumbledore are targeted by the Wizard authorities as an authoritarian bureaucrat slowly seizes power at Hogwarts.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
movies.shortDescription: As Harry Potter begins his sixth year at Hogwarts, he discovers an old book marked as the property of the Half-Blood Prince and begins to learn more about Lord Voldemorts dark past.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 1
movies.shortDescription: As Harry races against time and evil to destroy the Horcruxes, he uncovers the existence of three most powerful objects in the wizarding world: the Deathly Hallows.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part 2
movies.shortDescription: Harry, Ron and Hermione search for Voldemorts remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.

movies.title: Haunted Mansion
movies.shortDescription: Workaholic realtor Jim Evers, his wife/business partner Sara and their two children are summoned to a mansion. When they discover that the place is haunted, Jim discovers an important lesson about the family hes neglected as they attempt to escape.

movies.title: HellBoy
movies.shortDescription: A demon, raised from infancy after being conjured by and rescued from the Nazis, grows up to become a defender against the forces of darkness.

movies.title: HellBoy 2: The Golden Army
movies.shortDescription: The mythical world starts a rebellion against humanity in order to rule the Earth, so Hellboy and his team must save the world from the rebellious creatures.

movies.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
movies.shortDescription: Hobbit 1: A reluctant hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, sets out to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of dwarves to reclaim their mountain home - and the gold within it - from the dragon Smaug.

movies.title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug
movies.shortDescription: Hobbit 2: The dwarves, along with Bilbo Baggins and Gandalf the Grey, continue their quest to reclaim Erebor, their homeland, from Smaug. Bilbo Baggins is in possession of a mysterious and magical ring.

movies.title: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
movies.shortDescription: Hobbit 3: Bilbo and Company are forced to engage in a war against an array of combatants and keep the Lonely Mountain from falling into the hands of a rising darkness

movies.title: Hocus Pocus
movies.shortDescription: After three centuries, three witch sisters are resurrected in Salem Massachusetts on Halloween night, and it is up to two teen-agers, a young girl, and an immortal cat to put an end to the witches reign of terror once and for all.

movies.title: Hook
movies.shortDescription: When Captain Hook kidnaps his children, an adult Peter Pan must return to Neverland and reclaim his youthful spirit in order to challenge his old enemy.

movies.title: Hop
movies.shortDescription: E.B., the Easter Bunnys teenage son, heads to Hollywood, determined to become a drummer in a rock n roll band. In LA, hes taken in by Fred after the out-of-work slacker hits E.B. with his car.

movies.title: Horton Hears a Who
movies.shortDescription: Horton the Elephant struggles to protect a microscopic community from his neighbors who refuse to believe it exists.

movies.title: How the Grinch Stole Christmas
movies.shortDescription: A creature is intent on stealing Christmas.

movies.title: Hugo
movies.shortDescription: Set in 1930s Paris, an orphan who lives in the walls of a train station is wrapped up in a mystery involving his late father and an automaton.

movies.title: Hunger Games (1)
movies.shortDescription: Katniss Everdeen voluntarily takes her younger sisters place in the Hunger Games, a televised fight to the death in which two teenagers from each of the twelve Districts of Panem are chosen at random to compete.

movies.title: Hunger Games (2): Catching Fire
movies.shortDescription: Katniss Everdeen and Peeta Mellark become targets of the Capitol after their victory in the 74th Hunger Games sparks a rebellion in the Districts of Panem.

movies.title: Hunger Games (3): Mockingjay Part 1
movies.shortDescription: Katniss Everdeen is in District 13 after she shatters the games forever. Under the leadership of President Coin and the advice of her trusted friends, Katniss spreads her wings as she fights to save Peeta and a nation moved by her courage.

movies.title: The Hunters
movies.shortDescription: A family of archeologists hunt down artifacts from fairy tales that have been hidden around the globe.

movies.title: Imaginaerum
movies.shortDescription: A coma sends an old man into his childhoods sinister fantasy world, where he must fight dementia and gain back his memories before its too late.

movies.title: Immortal
movies.shortDescription: In the distant future, Earth is occupied by ancient gods and genetically altered humans. When a god is sentenced to death he seeks a new human host and a woman to bear his child.

movies.title: Immortals
movies.shortDescription: Theseus is a mortal man chosen by Zeus to lead the fight against the ruthless King Hyperion, who is on a rampage across Greece to obtain a weapon that can destroy humanity.

movies.title: Indian in the Cupboard
movies.shortDescription: On his ninth birthday a boy receives many presents. Two of them first seem to be less important: an old cupboard from his brother and a little Indian figure made of plastic from his best friend. But these two presents turn out to be much more magic than the rest...

movies.title: Interview With a Vampire
movies.shortDescription: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

movies.title: Journey To The Center of the Earth
movies.shortDescription: On a quest to find out what happened to his missing brother, a scientist, his nephew and their mountain guide discover a fantastic and dangerous lost world in the center of the earth.

movies.title: Journey 2 The Mysterious Island
movies.shortDescription: Sean Anderson partners with his moms husband on a mission to find his grandfather, who is thought to be missing on a mythical island.

movies.title: John Carter
movies.shortDescription: Transported to Barsoom, a Civil War vet discovers a barren planet seemingly inhabited by 12 foot tall barbarians. Finding himself prisoner of these creatures, he escapes, only to encounter Woola and a princess in desperate need of a savior.

movies.title: Jumper
movies.shortDescription: A teenager with teleportation abilities suddenly finds himself in the middle of an ancient war between those like him and their sworn annihilators.

movies.title: Jack the Giant Slayer
movies.shortDescription: The ancient war between humans and a race of giants is reignited when Jack, a young farmhand fighting for a kingdom and the love of a princess, opens a gateway between the two worlds.

movies.title: Krull
movies.shortDescription: A prince and a fellowship of companions set out to rescue his bride from a fortress of alien invaders who have arrived on their home planet.

movies.title: Knowing
movies.shortDescription: M.I.T. professor John Koestler links a mysterious list of numbers from a time capsule to past and future disasters and sets out to prevent the ultimate catastrophe.

movies.title: Little Monsters
movies.shortDescription: A boy discovers an incredible and gruesome world of monsters under his bed.

movies.title: Lego Movie
movies.shortDescription: An ordinary Lego construction worker, thought to be the prophesied Special, is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant from gluing the Lego universe into eternal stasis.

movies.title: The Last Airbender
movies.shortDescription: The story follows the adventures of Aang, a young successor to a long line of Avatars, who must put his childhood ways aside and stop the Fire Nation from enslaving the Water, Earth and Air nations.

movies.title: Legion
movies.shortDescription: A group of strangers fight for the welfare of humanity.

movies.title: League of Extraordinary Gentlemen
movies.shortDescription: In an alternate Victorian Age world, a group of famous contemporary fantasy, SF and adventure characters team up on a secret mission.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: Fellowship of the Ring
movies.shortDescription: A meek hobbit of the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to Mount Doom to destroy the One Ring and the dark lord Sauron.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
movies.shortDescription: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Saurons new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: Return of the King
movies.shortDescription: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Saurons army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

movies.title: Legends of the Guardians Owls of Gahoole
movies.shortDescription: When a young owl is abducted by an evil Owl army, he must escape with new found friends and seek the legendary Guardians to stop the menace.

movies.title: Lemony Snicket: A Series of Unfortunate Events
movies.shortDescription: When a massive fire kills their parents, three children are delivered to the custody of cousin and stage actor Count Olaf, who is secretly plotting to steal their parents vast fortune.

movies.title: Left Behind
movies.shortDescription: A small group of survivors are left behind after millions of people suddenly vanish and the world is plunged into chaos and destruction.

movies.title: Queen of the Damned

movies.title: Men in Black 3
movies.shortDescription: Agent J travels in time to M.I.B.s early days in 1969 to stop an alien from assassinating his friend Agent K and changing history.

movies.title: Mortal Intruments: City of Bones
movies.shortDescription: When her mother disappears, Clary Fray learns that she descends from a line of warriors who protect our world from demons. She joins forces with others like her and heads into a dangerous alternate New York called Downworld.

movies.title: The Mummy

movies.title: The Mummy Returns

movies.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
movies.shortDescription: In the Far East, Alex OConnell, the son of famed mummy fighters Rick and Evy OConnell, unearths the mummy of the first Emperor of Qin a shape-shifting entity cursed by a witch centuries ago.

movies.title: The Secret of Moonacre
movies.shortDescription: When 13 year old Maria Merryweathers father dies, leaving her orphaned and homeless, she is forced to leave her luxurious London life to go and live with Sir Benjamin, an eccentric uncle she didnt know she had, at the mysterious Moonacre Manor. Soon Maria finds herself in a crumbling moonlit world torn apart by the hatred of an ancient feud with the dark and sinister De Noir family. Maria discovers that she is the last Moon Princess

movies.title: Maleficent
movies.shortDescription: A vengeful fairy is driven to curse an infant princess, only to discover that the child may be the one person who can restore peace to their troubled land.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.shortDescription: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: The Neverending Story
movies.shortDescription: A troubled boy dives into a wonderous fantasy world through the pages of a mysterious book.

movies.title: The Neverending Story 2

movies.title: The Neverending Story 3
movies.shortDescription: A young boy must restore order when a group of bullies steal the magical book that acts as a portal between Earth and the imaginary world of Fantasia.

movies.title: Neverending Story Tales: The Beginning

Bastian creates an enchanted world called Fantasia, inhabited by dragons, dark knights and assorted heroes and villains.

movies.title: Neverending Story Tales:The Gift

Bastian creates an enchanted world called Fantasia, inhabited by dragons, dark knights and assorted heroes and villains.

Bastian creates an enchanted world called Fantasia, inhabited by dragons, dark knights and assorted heroes and villains.

movies.title: The Ninth Gate
movies.shortDescription: A rare book dealer, while seeking out the last two copies of a demon text, gets drawn into a conspiracy with supernatural overtones.

movies.title: Noah
movies.shortDescription: A man is chosen by his worlds creator to undertake a momentous mission before an apocalyptic flood cleanses the world.

movies.title: Once Bitten
movies.shortDescription: A vampire Countess needs to drink the blood of a virgin in order to keep her eternal beauty. It seems that all is hopeless, until she bumps into Mark Kendall.

movies.title: Odd Thomas
movies.shortDescription: In a California desert town, a short order cook with clairvoyant abilities encounters a mysterious man with a link to dark, threatening forces.

movies.title: Percy Jackson: The Lightning Thief
movies.shortDescription: A teenager discovers hes the descendant of a Greek god and sets out on an adventure to settle an on going battle between the gods.

movies.title: Percy Jackson: Sea of Monsters
movies.shortDescription: In order to restore their dying safe haven, the son of Poseidon and his friends embark on a quest to the Sea of Monsters to find the mythical Golden Fleece while trying to stop an ancient evil from rising.

movies.title: Pirates of the Caribbean 1: Curse of the Black Pearl

movies.title: Pirates of the Caribbean 2: Dead Mans Chest
movies.shortDescription: Jack Sparrow races to recover the heart of Davy Jones to avoid enslaving his soul to Jones service, as other friends and foes seek the heart for their own agenda as well.

movies.title: Pirates of the Caribbean 3: At Worlds End
movies.shortDescription: Captain Barbossa, Will Turner and Elizabeth Swann must sail off the edge of the map, navigate treachery and betrayal, and make their final alliances for one last decisive battle.

movies.title: Pirates of the Caribbean 4: On Stranger Tides
movies.shortDescription: Jack Sparrow and Barbossa embark on a quest to find the elusive fountain of youth, only to discover that Blackbeard and his daughter are after it too.

movies.title: Push
movies.shortDescription: Two young Americans with special abilities must race to find a girl in Hong Kong before a shadowy government organization called Division does.

movies.title: Princess Diaries
movies.shortDescription: Princess Diaries

movies.title: Princess Diaries 2
movies.shortDescription: Mia Thermopolis has just found out that she is the heir apparent to the throne of Genovia. With her friends Lilly and Michael Moscovitz in tow, she tries to navigate through the rest of her 16th year.

movies.title: Premonition
movies.shortDescription: Depressed housewife learns her husband was killed in a car accident the day previously, awakens the next morning to find him alive and well at home, and then awakens the next day after to a world in which he is still dead.

movies.title: Priest

movies.title: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time

movies.title: The Rite
