movies.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
movies.shortDescription: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

movies.title: Sixth Sense
movies.shortDescription: A boy who communicates with spirits that dont know theyre dead seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

movies.title: The Scorpion King
movies.shortDescription: A desert warrior rises up against the evil army that is destroying his homeland. He captures the enemys key sorcerer, takes her deep into the desert and prepares for a final showdown.

movies.title: Seven
movies.shortDescription: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his modus operandi.

movies.title: Spawn
movies.shortDescription: A mercenary is killed, but comes back from Hell as a reluctant soldier of the Devil.

movies.title: Season of the Witch
movies.shortDescription: 14th century knights transport a suspected witch to a monastery, where monks deduce her powers could be the source of the Black Plague.

movies.title: Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow
movies.shortDescription: After New York City receives a series of attacks from giant flying robots, a reporter teams up with a pilot in search of their origin, as well as the reason for the disappearances of famous scientists around the world.

movies.title: Sleepy Hollow
movies.shortDescription: Ichabod Crane is sent to Sleepy Hollow to investigate the decapitations of 3 people with the culprit being the legendary apparition, the Headless Horseman.

movies.title: Solomon Kane

movies.shortDescription: A priest from the Vatican is sent to Sao Paulo, Brazil to investigate the appearance of the face of the Virgin Mary on the side of a building. While there he hears of a statue of the Virgin Mary bleeding tears in a small town outside of the city. Meanwhile, a young woman in the U.S. begins to show signs of stigmata, the wounds of Christ. The priest from the Vatican links up with her and cares for her as she is increasingly afflicted by the stigmata.

movies.title: Super 8
movies.shortDescription: During the summer of 1979, a group of friends witness a train crash and investigate subsequent unexplained events in their small town.

movies.title: The Seeker: The Dark is Rising
movies.shortDescription: A boys life is turned upside down when he learns that he is the last of a group of immortal warriors who have dedicated their lives to fighting the forces of the dark.

movies.title: Sorcerers Apprentice
movies.shortDescription: Master sorcerer Balthazar Blake must find and train Merlins descendant to defeat dark sorceress Morgana le Fey.

movies.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
movies.shortDescription: Upon moving into the rundown Spiderwick Estate with their mother, twin brothers Jared and Simon Grace, along with their sister Mallory, find themselves pulled into an alternate world full of faeries and other creatures.

movies.title: Splash
movies.shortDescription: A young man is reunited with a mermaid who saves him from drowning as a boy and falls in love not knowing who/what she is.

movies.title: Changeling
movies.shortDescription: A grief stricken mother takes on the LAPD to her own detriment when it stubbornly tries to pass off an obvious impostor as her missing child, while also refusing to give up hope that she will find him one day.

movies.title: Twilight 1
movies.shortDescription: A teenage girl risks everything when she falls in love with a vampire.

movies.title: Twilight 3: Eclipse
movies.shortDescription: As a string of mysterious killings grips Seattle, Bella, whose high school graduation is fast approaching, is forced to choose between her love for vampire Edward and her friendship with werewolf Jacob.

movies.title: Twilight 2: New Moon
movies.shortDescription: Edward leaves Bella after an attack that nearly claimed her life, and in her depression she falls into yet another paranormal relationship, this time with werewolf Jacob Black.

movies.title: Twilight 4: Breaking Dawn Part 1
movies.shortDescription: The Quileutes close in on expecting parents Edward and Bella, whose unborn child poses a threat to the Wolf Pack and the towns people of Forks.

movies.title: Twilight 5: Breaking Dawn Part 2
movies.shortDescription: After the birth of Renesmee, the Cullens gather other vampire clans in order to protect the child from a false allegation that puts the family in front of the Volturi.

movies.title: Underworld
movies.shortDescription: Selene, a beautiful vampire warrior, entrenched in a war between the vampire and werewolf races. Although she is aligned with the vampires, she falls in love with Michael, a human who is sought by werewolves for unknown reasons.

movies.title: Underworld 2: Evolution
movies.shortDescription: Picking up directly from the previous film, vampire warrior Selene and the half werewolf Michael hunt for clues to reveal the history of their races and the war between them.

movies.title: Underworld 3: Rise of the Lycans
movies.shortDescription: An origins story centered on the centuries old feud between the race of aristocratic vampires and their onetime slaves, the Lycans.

movies.title: Underworld 4: Awakening
movies.shortDescription: When human forces discover the existence of the Vampire and Lycan clans, a war to eradicate both species commences. The vampire warrior Selene leads the battle against humankind.

movies.title: Unicorn City
movies.shortDescription: Voss entices local gamers to create a Utopian society in an attempt to impress a potential employer, but paradise is disrupted when his nemesis lays claim to the city and Vosss true love.

movies.title: Van Helsing
movies.shortDescription: The notorious monster hunter is sent to Transylvania to stop Count Dracula who is using Dr. Frankensteins research and a werewolf for some sinister purpose.

movies.title: Wrath of the Titans
movies.shortDescription: Perseus braves the treacherous underworld to rescue his father, Zeus, captured by his son, Ares, and brother Hades who unleash the ancient Titans upon the world.

movies.title: Waterworld
movies.shortDescription: In a future where the polar ice caps have melted and Earth is almost entirely submerged, a mutated mariner fights starvation and outlaw smokers, and reluctantly helps a woman and a young girl try to find dry land.

movies.title: Warm Bodies
movies.shortDescription: After a highly unusual zombie saves a still-living girl from an attack, the two form a relationship that sets in motion events that might transform the entire lifeless world.

movies.title: The Wizard of Oz
movies.shortDescription: Dorothy Gale is swept away to a magical land in a tornado and embarks on a quest to see the Wizard who can help her return home.

movies.title: The Wizard of Oz: Oz, The Great and Powerful
movies.shortDescription: A small time magician is swept away to an enchanted land and is forced into a power struggle between three witches.

movies.title: Seventh Son
movies.shortDescription: Young Thomas is apprenticed to the local Spook to learn to fight evil spirits. His first great challenge comes when the powerful Mother Malkin escapes her confinement while the Spook is away.

movies.title: Avengers Grimm
movies.shortDescription: When Rumpelstiltskin destroys the Magic Mirror and escapes to the modern world, the four princesses of Once Upon a Time; Cinderella, Sleeping Beauty, Snow White, and Rapunzel; are sucked through the portal too. Well trained and endowed with magical powers, the four women must fight Rumpelstiltskin and his army of thralls before he enslaves everyone on Earth.

movies.title: Vampire Academy
movies.shortDescription: Rose Hathaway is a Dhampir, half human half vampire, a guardian of the Moroi, peaceful, mortal vampires living discreetly within our world. Her calling is to protect the Moroi from bloodthirsty, immortal Vampires, the Strigoi.

movies.title: Mythica A Quest for Heros
movies.shortDescription: The young magician Marek dreams of exciting adventures. When she meets the help seeking priestess Teela she offers her assistance and provides a motley troupe. Together they go in search of Teelas sister, who was kidnapped by a wild ogre.

movies.title: Dragonheart 3: The Sorcerers Curse
movies.shortDescription: When aspiring knight Gareth goes in search of a fallen comet rumored to contain gold, he is shocked to instead find the dragon Drago. After Drago saves Gareths life the two become intricately bonded, and must work together to defeat an evil sorcerer and stop his reign of terror. Along the way, Gareth learns the true meaning of being a knight in this fantasy action adventure for the ages.

movies.title: Conan the Barbarian
movies.shortDescription: A vengeful barbarian warrior sets off to avenge his tribe and his parents whom were slain by an evil sorcerer and his warriors when he was a boy.

movies.title: Conan the Destroyer
movies.shortDescription: Conan leads a ragtag group of adventurers on a quest for a princess.

movies.title: Divergent (2): Insurgent
movies.shortDescription: Beatrice Prior must confront her inner demons and continue her fight against a powerful alliance which threatens to tear her society apart with the help from others on her side.

movies.title: Poltergeist (2015)
movies.shortDescription: A family whose suburban home is haunted by evil forces must come together to rescue their youngest daughter after the apparitions take her captive.

movies.title: Beasts of Southern Wild
movies.shortDescription: Faced with both her hot tempered fathers fading health and melting ice caps that flood her ramshackle bayou community and unleash ancient aurochs, six-year-old Hushpuppy must learn the ways of courage and love

movies.title: Labyrinth
movies.shortDescription: A selfish 16 year old girl is given 13 hours to solve a labyrinth and rescue her baby brother when her wish for him to be taken away is granted by the Goblin King.

movies.title: Last Witch Hunter
movies.shortDescription: The last witch hunter is all that stands between humanity and the combined forces of the most horrifying witches in history.

movies.title: Gods of Egypt
movies.shortDescription: Mortal hero Bek teams with the god Horus in an alliance against Set, the merciless god of darkness, who has usurped Egypts throne, plunging the once peaceful and prosperous empire into chaos and conflict.

movies.title: Dark Shadows
movies.shortDescription: An imprisoned vampire, Barnabas Collins, is set free and returns to his ancestral home, where his dysfunctional descendants are in need of his protection.

movies.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
movies.shortDescription: Eric and fellow warrior Sara, raised as members of ice Queen Freyas army, try to conceal their forbidden love as they fight to survive the wicked intentions of both Freya and her sister Ravenna.

movies.title: Hunger Games (4): Mockingjay Part 2

movies.title: Flash Gordon

movies.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
movies.shortDescription: The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New Yorks secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school.

movies.title: Underworld Blood Wars
movies.shortDescription: Vampire death dealer, Selene (Kate Beckinsale) fights to end the eternal war between the Lycan clan and the Vampire faction that betrayed her.

movies.title: Dont Kill It
movies.shortDescription: An ancient demon terrorizes a tiny Mississippi town.

movies.title: Wonder Woman

movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Volume 2
movies.shortDescription: The Guardians must fight to keep their newfound family together as they unravel the mystery of Peter Quills true parentage.

movies.title: Alien Abduction
movies.shortDescription: A vacationing family encounters an alien threat in this thriller based on the real-life Brown Mountain Lights phenomenon in North Carolina.

movies.title: American Werewolf in Paris

movies.title: Alien(Unverified)
movies.shortDescription: The commercial vessel Nostromo receives a distress call from an unexplored planet. After searching for survivors, the crew heads home only to realize that a deadly bioform has joined them.

movies.title: Anaconda

movies.title: Animal

Holed up in an isolated cabin, tensions mount as long-buried secrets are revealed. As the body count rises, the group must put their differences aside and fight for survival.

movies.title: As Above, So Below
movies.shortDescription: When a team of explorers ventures into the catacombs that lie beneath the streets of Paris, they uncover the dark secret that lies within this city of the dead.

movies.title: Blob

movies.title: Burrowers

movies.title: Byzantium

movies.title: Catacombs
movies.shortDescription: On her first trip to Paris, a young woman hits a party in the Catacombs, the 200-mile labyrinth of limestone tunnels under the city thats lined with the remains of 7 million people. Separated from her friends, she becomes convinced that someone or something is chasing her.

movies.title: Childs Play
movies.shortDescription: A single mother gives her son a much sought after doll for his birthday, only to discover that it is possessed by the soul of a serial killer.

movies.title: Childs Play 2

movies.title: Childs Play 3

movies.title: Childs Play: Bride of Chucky

movies.title: Childs Play: Seed of Chucky

movies.title: Childs Play: Curse of Chucky

movies.title: The Collector
movies.shortDescription: Desperate to repay his debt to his ex-wife, an ex-con plots a heist at his new employers country home, unaware that a second criminal has also targeted the property, and rigged it with a series of deadly traps.

movies.title: The Conjuring
movies.shortDescription: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

movies.title: Crush

movies.title: Day of the Dead
movies.shortDescription: When a small Colorado town is overrun by the flesh hungry dead a small group of survivors try to escape in a last ditch effort to stay alive.

movies.title: Disturbia

movies.title: Friday the 13th (2009)

Anyone who crosses his path is in mortal danger.

movies.title: Psycho 3

movies.title: Poltergeist

movies.title: Poltergeist 2: The Other Side

movies.title: Poltergeist 3

movies.title: Ruins

movies.title: Saw 2
movies.shortDescription: Jigsaw locks a few unlucky people in a booby trapped shelter and they must find a way out before they inhale too much of a lethal nerve gas and die. But they must watch out, for the traps Jigsaw has set in the shelter lead to death also.

movies.title: Saw 3
movies.shortDescription: As a deadly battle rages over Jigsaws brutal legacy, a group of Jigsaw survivors gathers to seek the support of self help guru and fellow survivor Bobby Dagen, a man whose own dark secrets unleash a new wave of terror.

movies.title: Saw 4
movies.shortDescription: Jigsaw and his apprentice Amanda are dead. Now, upon the news of Detective Kerrys murder, two seasoned FBI profilers, Agent Strahm and Agent Perez, arrive in the terrified community to assist the veteran Detective Hoffman in sifting through Jigsaws latest grisly remains and piecing together the puzzle. However, when SWAT Commander Rigg is abducted and thrust into a game, the last officer untouched by Jigsaw has but ninety minutes to overcome a series of demented traps and save an old friend or face the deadly consequences.

movies.title: Saw 5
movies.shortDescription: Following Jigsaws grisly demise, Mark Hoffman, the final apprentice to the serial killer is deigned a hero. Meanwhile, Agent Strahm continues to track Hoffman while another group of strangers are put through a series of gruesome traps.

movies.title: Saw 6

movies.title: Friday the 13th Part 9: Jason Goes to Hell

movies.shortDescription: Lorraine and Ed Warren travel to north London to help a single mother raising four children alone in a house plagued by a malicious spirit.

movies.title: What We Become
movies.shortDescription: A family of four is quarantined in their home as a virulent strand of the flu spreads into town and they are forced to the extreme to escape alive.

movies.title: 28 Weeks Later
movies.shortDescription: Six months after the rage virus was inflicted on the population of Great Britain, the US Army helps to secure a small area of London for the survivors to repopulate and start again. But not everything goes to plan.

movies.title: Split
movies.shortDescription: Three girls are kidnapped by a man with a diagnosed 23 distinct personalities, they must try to escape before the apparent emergence of a frightful new 24th.

movies.title: Bye Bye Man
movies.shortDescription: Three friends stumble upon the horrific origins of a mysterious figure they discover is the root cause of the evil behind unspeakable acts.

movies.title: Get Out
movies.shortDescription: A young African American man visits his Caucasian girlfriend's mysterious family estate.

movies.title: Alien Covenant
movies.shortDescription: The crew of a colony ship, bound for a remote planet, discover an uncharted paradise with a threat beyond their imagination, and must attempt a harrowing escape.

movies.title: IT (2017)
movies.shortDescription: A group of bullied kids band together when a shapeshifting demon, taking the appearance of a clown, begins hunting children.

movies.title: The People Under the Stairs
movies.shortDescription: Two adults and a juvenile burglar break into a house occupied by a brother and sister and their stolen children and become trapped.

movies.title: Happy Death Day
movies.shortDescription: A college student must relive the day of her murder over and over again, in a loop that will end only when she discovers her killers identity.

movies.title: Jigsaw
movies.shortDescription: Bodies are turning up around the city, each having met a uniquely gruesome demise. As the investigation proceeds, evidence points to one suspect: John Kramer, the man known as Jigsaw, who has been dead for ten years.

movies.title: A Christmas Carol
movies.shortDescription: An animated retelling of Charles Dickens classic novel about a Victorian-era miser taken on a journey of self-redemption, courtesy of several mysterious Christmas apparitions.

movies.title: A Christmas Story
movies.shortDescription: Ralphie has to convince his parents, his teacher, and Santa that a Red Ryder B.B. gun really is the perfect gift for the 1940s.

movies.title: A Christmas Story 2
movies.shortDescription: Five years later, Ralphie has his eyes fixed on a car. But trouble is sure to follow.

movies.title: Adventurer: The Curse of the Midas Box
movies.shortDescription: Ancient mysteries. Powerful evil. And a fearless heros quest through a fantastical realm of steam-powered wonders and sinister magic... In THE ADVENTURER: THE CURSE OF THE MIDAS BOX, seventeen-year-old Mariah Mundis life is turned upside down when his parents vanish and his younger brother is kidnapped. Following a trail of clues to the darkly majestic Prince Regent Hotel, Mariah discovers a hidden realm of child-stealing monsters, deadly secrets and a long-lost artifact that grants limitless wealth - but also devastating supernatural power. With the fate of his world, and his family at stake, Mariah will risk everything to unravel the Curse of the Midas Box!

movies.title: Adventures of Sharkboy and Lavagirl
movies.shortDescription: A boy dreams up shark-boy and lava-girl and the horror that lies within their planet.

movies.title: Agent Cody Banks
movies.shortDescription: A government agent trains Cody Banks in the ways of covert operations that require younger participants.

movies.title: Air Buddies
movies.shortDescription: When dad BUDDY and mom MOLLY are dognapped, their five adorable pups, the AIR BUDDIES, must save the day...

movies.title: Aladdin
movies.shortDescription: Aladdin, a street urchin, accidentally meets Princess Jasmine, who is in the city undercover. They love each other, but she can only marry a prince.

movies.title: Aladdin: The Return of Jafar
movies.shortDescription: Jafar comes for revenge on Aladdin, using a foolish thief and Iagos treachery to find a way back into power.

movies.title: Aladdin: King of Thieves
movies.shortDescription: At long last, Aladdin is about to marry the Princess Jasmine. Despite the presence and encouragement of his friends Genie, Carpet, and Abu, he is fearful and anxious. He is most worried as to what kind of father he will be, having never known his own. But when the 40 Thieves disrupt the wedding trying to steal a magical oracular talisman, Aladdin is drawn into a dangerous quest to stop the thieves...and find his long-lost father.

movies.title: Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day
movies.shortDescription: Alexanders day begins with gum stuck in his hair, followed by more calamities. Though he finds little sympathy from his family and begins to wonder if bad things only happen to him, his mom, dad, brother, and sister all find themselves living through their own terrible, horrible, no good, very bad day.

movies.title: Alice in Wonderland
movies.shortDescription: Nineteen-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny: to end the Red Queens reign of terror.

movies.title: Alice in Wonderland
movies.shortDescription: Alice stumbles into the world of Wonderland. Will she get home? Not if the Queen of Hearts has her way.

movies.title: Aliens in the Attic
movies.shortDescription: A group of kids must protect their vacation home from invading aliens.

movies.title: A Little Princess
movies.shortDescription: A young girl is relegated to servitude at a boarding school when her father goes missing and is presumed dead.

movies.title: Alpha and Omega
movies.shortDescription: Two young wolves at opposite ends of their packs social order are thrown together into a foreign land and need each other to return home, but love complicates everything.

movies.title: Alpha and Omega 2: Howl-iday Adventure
movies.shortDescription: Kate, Humphrey, and their 3 wolf cubs (Stinky, Claudette, and Runt) are happily preparing to celebrate their first winter together when their smallest cub, Runt, mysteriously disappears. They must now go on a new journey across the wilderness to find and bring back Runt before the winter snows block their way home. Its their greatest adventure yet, filled with action and suspense as well as plenty of the humor and heartwarming moments that were delivered in the first theatrical release. While their adventure does not end exactly as planned, Kate and Humphrey discover that Home is where the Family Is.

movies.title: Alpha and Omega 3
movies.shortDescription: Join the pack in this wild, warmhearted and totally pawsome adventure starring everyones favorite alphas and omegas. Its time for The Great Wolf Games, when all the alphas in the packs set aside their differences for some friendly competition. When an unexpected accident puts many of our packs star alpha wolves out of commission, a new team is assembled that includes forest friends not in the pack. Can Coach Humphrey lead his ragtag group of underdogs to victory? Find out in this thrilling movie that will leave you howling for more.

movies.title: Alpha and Omega: Legend of Sawtoothed Cave
movies.shortDescription: The Alphas and Omegas share a thrilling adventure after Runt discovers the Saw Tooth Cave. Runt finds a wolf in need and lends a helping paw.

movies.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks
movies.shortDescription: A struggling songwriter named Dave Seville finds success when he comes across a trio of singing chipmunks: mischievous leader Alvin, brainy Simon, and chubby, impressionable Theodore.

movies.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks the Squeakquel
movies.shortDescription: The world famous singing pre-teen chipmunk trio return to contend with the pressures of school, celebrity, and a rival female music group known as The Chipettes.

movies.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks 3: Chipwrecked
movies.shortDescription: Playing around while aboard a cruise ship, the Chipmunks and Chipettes accidentally go overboard and end up marooned in a tropical paradise. They discover their new turf is not as deserted as it seems.

movies.title: American Girl: Saige Paints the Sky
movies.shortDescription: Meet nine-year old Saige, a talented artist with a passion for horses, in this modern-day story about finding your voice! Saige is excited about the new school year, until she discovers that art-her favorite class-has been cut. On top of that, her best friend, Tessa, seems to be spending more and more time with another girl. For help, Saige turns to her grandma Mimi, a well-known artist and horse-woman, who inspires her to take action. Can Saige find the courage to overcome her fears and save the art program-and her friendship with Tessa? Heart-warming, empowering, and fun, its a movie for every girl who has ever dreamed big.

movies.title: American Girl: McKenna Shoots for the Stars
movies.shortDescription: American Girl McKenna comes to life in this modern-day adventure about a determined gymnast who must focus on her strengths to overcome challenges and find a way to believe in herself again.

movies.title: American Girl Adventure: Felicity
movies.shortDescription: An American Girl Adventure is the second in the series of An American Girl films. It is a television film that is based on the American Girl childrens books written by Valerie Tripp, and was released in November 29, 2005.

movies.title: American Girl: Chrissa Stands Strong
movies.shortDescription: A fourth grader and her friends deal with bullying from a more popular girl in their class.

movies.title: American Girl: Kit Kittredge
movies.shortDescription: Set in Cincinnati at the height of the Great Depression, Kit Kittredge, a resourceful young girl, helps her mother run a boardinghouse after her father loses his job.

movies.title: Anastasia
movies.shortDescription: The last surviving child of the Russian Royal Family hooks up with two con men to reunite with her grandmother, the Dowager Empress, while the undead Rasputin seeks her death.

movies.title: Angels in the Outfield
movies.shortDescription: When a boy prays for a chance to have a family if the California Angels win the pennant, angels are assigned to make that possible.

movies.title: Antz
movies.shortDescription: A rather neurotic ant tries to break from his totalitarian society while trying to win the affection of the princess he loves.

movies.title: Petes Dragon
movies.shortDescription: The adventures of an orphaned boy named Pete and his best friend Elliot, who just so happens to be a dragon.

movies.title: Aristocats
movies.shortDescription: With the help of a smooth talking tomcat, a family of Parisian felines set to inherit a fortune from their owner try to make it back home after a jealous butler kidnaps them and leaves them in the country.

movies.title: Around the World in 80 Days
movies.shortDescription: A bet pits a British inventor, a Chinese thief, and a French artist on a worldwide adventure that they can circle the globe in 80 days.

movies.title: Arthur and the Invisibles
movies.shortDescription: Ten-year-old Arthur, in a bid to save his grandfathers house from being demolished, goes looking for some much-fabled hidden treasure in the land of the Minimoys, a tiny people living in harmony with nature.

movies.title: Astro Boy
movies.shortDescription: When an android replica of a boy is rejected by his aggrieved creator, he goes off to find his own identity in an adventure that would make him his times greatest hero.

movies.title: Atlantis: The Lost Empire
movies.shortDescription: A young adventurer named Milo Thatch joins an intrepid group of explorers to find the mysterious lost continent of Atlantis.

movies.title: Ant Bully (VERIFY WORKING STATUS)
movies.shortDescription: After Lucas Nickle floods an ant colony with his watergun, hes magically shrunken down to insect size and sentenced to hard labor in the ruins.

movies.title: Balto
movies.shortDescription: An outcast half-wolf risks his life to prevent a deadly epidemic from ravaging Nome, Alaska.

movies.title: Balto 2: Wolf Quest
movies.shortDescription: Balto and his daughter Aleu embark on a journey of adventure and self discovery.

movies.title: Balto 3: Wings of Change
movies.shortDescription: The mail in the north used to be delivered by dogsled, but the success of airplane delivery leaves Balto and the other sled dogs feeling neglected. However, when a delivery plane crashes on a mountain side, the sled dogs get the opportunity to show their worth. This story also prominently features Baltos son, Kodi, who was among the puppy litter that we met in Balto II: Wolf Quest.

movies.title: Bambi
movies.shortDescription: The story of a young deer growing up in the forest after his mother is shot by hunters.

movies.title: Bambi 2
movies.shortDescription: The story of Bambi growing up in the care of his father, The Great Prince of the Forest.

movies.title: Barbie Fairytopia
movies.shortDescription: Elina is a flower fairy who discovers that her home of Magic Meadow has been overcome by a horrible malady that is killing the flowers and making the fairies unable to fly. With the help of Bibble, a puffball and a giant butterfly named Hue she attempts to find Azura, a Guardian Fairy. Shes challenged along the way by the evil Laverna who wants to usurp the Enchantress, the ruler of Fairytopia.

movies.title: Barbie Island Princess
movies.shortDescription: Barbie plays Rosella in this new musical film. Shipwrecked as a child, Rosella grows up on the island under the watchful eyes of her loving animal friends. The arrival of Prince Antonio leads Rosella and her furry pals to explore civilization and ultimately save the kingdom by uncovering a secret plot.

movies.title: Barbie Fashion Fairytale
movies.shortDescription: Barbies modern adventure takes her to Paris, where she makes new friends and meets magical characters that discover their true designer talents and use their inner sparkle to save the day!

movies.title: Barbie in a Mermaid Tale
movies.shortDescription: Barbie stars as Merliah, a surfer who learns a shocking secret: shes a mermaid! She and her dolphin friend set out for an undersea adventure to rescue her mother, the queen of Oceana.

movies.title: Barbie in a Mermaid Tale 2
movies.shortDescription: Barbie returns in Mermaid Tale 2 as the beautiful surfing mermaid, Merliah Summers. Merliah is going to Australia for the ultimate surfing competition with her friends both human and sea. Things are looking up for Merliah until the evil mermaid Eris returns to try and take over the throne again.

movies.title: Barbie: A Fairy Secret
movies.shortDescription: When Ken is suddenly whisked away by a group of fairies, Barbies two fashion stylist friends reveal they are actually fairies and that Ken has been taken to a magical secret fairy world not far away! Barbie and her rival Raquelle take off with the fairy friends on an action-packed journey to bring him back.

movies.title: Barbie Princess Charm School
movies.shortDescription: Barbie stars as Blair, a kind-hearted girl who is chosen to attend Princess Charm School. In this magical place, she makes new friends and discovers that theres a princess in every girl!

movies.title: Barbie in a Perfect Christmas
movies.shortDescription: Barbie and her sisters have a whirlwind of activity as they pack and prepare for their big trip to Manhattan, Its December 23rd, where theyre going to have The Perfect Christmas! Mom and Dad are already in the city for work, so itll be wonderful to meet them there for the holiday.

movies.title: Barbie Princess and the Popstar
movies.shortDescription: In this sparkling musical adventure, Barbie stars as Tory, the kind-hearted princess of Meribella who would rather sing and dance than perform her royal duties. When her favorite pop star Keira visits the Kingdom, the girls discover they have much in common, including a magical secret that lets them look like one another.

movies.title: Barbie Mariposa: A Fairy Princess
movies.shortDescription: Join Mariposa and her new friend, Princess Catania, in this magical adventure to save the fairy land of Shimmervale. Together, the girls learn that with great friends, the sky is the limit!

movies.title: Barbie and the Pink Shoes
movies.shortDescription: Dance your way to a magical adventure with Barbie(TM) as Kristyn(TM), a ballerina with big dreams! When she tries on a pair of sparkling pink shoes, she and her best friend, Hailey(TM), are whisked away to a fantastical ballet world. There, Kristyn(TM) discovers she must dance in her favorite ballets in order to defeat an evil Snow Queen. With performances to the legendary Giselle and Swan Lake ballets, its a wonderful journey where if you dance with your heart, dreams come true!

movies.title: Barbie and her Sisters in a Pony Tale
movies.shortDescription: At a fun-filled riding academy in the Alps, Barbie and her sisters go on the vacation of a lifetime and Barbie finds the horse of her dreams.

movies.title: Barbie and the Pearl Princess
movies.shortDescription: This is the tale of a young mermaid who is being raised by her aunt. This young mermaid has the power to control pearls and make beautiful magic with them. One day her Aunt is called upon by a member of the royal family to help out at the official passing of the crown from the king and queen to the young prince since the death of the young princess. When the young mermaids aunt forgets her invitation to the royal party, the young mermaid takes off to give her the important paper.

movies.title: Barbie Princess Power
movies.shortDescription: Barbie stars as Kara, a modern-day princess with an everyday life. One day, after being kissed by a magical butterfly, Kara soon discovers she has amazing super powers allowing her to transform into Super Sparkle, her secret, crime-fighting alter ego who flies around the kingdom ready to save the day!

movies.title: Beauty and the Beast
movies.shortDescription: Belle, whose father is imprisoned by the Beast, offers herself instead and discovers her captor to be an enchanted prince.

movies.title: Beethoven: Christmas Adventure
movies.shortDescription: A Christmas elf accidentally takes off in Santas sleigh, crash lands in a small town, and loses the magic toy bag. Beethoven must rescue the elf, recover the bag from greedy crooks, and return the sleigh to Santa in time to save Christmas.

movies.title: Beethoven: Treasure Tail
movies.shortDescription: Get ready to howl with laughter in this all-new family comedy starring Americas favorite St. Bernard, the one and only Beethoven! After a doggone disaster of a movie shoot, the big-hearted pooch and his trainer, Eddie (Jonathan Silverman, Beethovens Big Break), are heading home when they get stranded in a small coastal village.

movies.title: Bee Movie
movies.shortDescription: Barry B. Benson, a bee just graduated from college, is disillusioned at his lone career choice: making honey. On a special trip outside the hive, Barrys life is saved by Vanessa, a florist in New York City. As their relationship blossoms, he discovers humans actually eat honey, and subsequently decides to sue them.

movies.title: Big Hero 6
movies.shortDescription: The special bond that develops between plus-sized inflatable robot Baymax, and prodigy Hiro Hamada, who team up with a group of friends to form a band of high-tech heroes.

movies.title: Black Cauldron
movies.shortDescription: A young boy and a bunch of misfit friends embark on a quest to find a dark magic item of ultimate power before a diabolical tyrant can.

movies.title: Blank Check
movies.shortDescription: By accident, the 12-year-old Preston is given a blank check and when he fills in $1,000,000 - he is able to get it! He is having fun spending the money, but the gangsters who owned it want it back...

movies.title: Bolt
movies.shortDescription: The canine star of a fictional sci-fi/action show that believes his powers are real embarks on a cross country trek to save his co-star from a threat he believes is just as real.

movies.title: Boxtrolls
movies.shortDescription: A young orphaned boy raised by underground cave-dwelling trash collectors tries to save his friends from an evil exterminator. Based on the childrens novel Here Be Monsters by Alan Snow.

movies.title: Brave
movies.shortDescription: Determined to make her own path in life, Princess Merida defies a custom that brings chaos to her kingdom. Granted one wish, Merida must rely on her bravery and her archery skills to undo a beastly curse.

movies.title: Bridge to Terabithia
movies.shortDescription: A preteens life turns upside down when he befriends the new girl in school and they imagine a whole new fantasy world to escape reality.

movies.title: Brother Bear
movies.shortDescription: When a young Inuit hunter needlessly kills a bear, he is magically changed into a bear himself as punishment with a talkative cub being his only guide to changing back.

movies.title: Brother Bear 2
movies.shortDescription: An old female friend of Kenai needs his help on a quest, much to Kodas growing consternation.

movies.title: Bugs Life
movies.shortDescription: A misfit ant, looking for warriors to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

movies.title: Camp Rock
movies.shortDescription: At a music camp for gifted teens, a popular teen idol overhears a girl singing and sets out to find who the talented voice belongs to. What he doesnt know is that the girl is actually a camp kitchen worker with a fear of being heard.

movies.title: Care Bear Movie
movies.shortDescription: The Care Bears watch over a young brother and sister who have lost their trust in humanity. Meanwhile an evil wizard wishes to cover the Earth in concrete.

movies.title: Care Bear Adventures In Wonderland
movies.shortDescription: The Care Bears and Alice set out to stop an evil wizard from taking over Wonderland.

movies.title: Care Bears: Flower Power
movies.shortDescription: Spring has sprung in Care-a-lot! All the Care Bears are here and full of sunshine cheer in eight tales blooming with Flower Power! Join the Care Bears for fun in the sun and more in these adventures!

movies.title: Cars
movies.shortDescription: A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.

movies.title: Cars 2
movies.shortDescription: Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espionage.

movies.title: Casper
movies.shortDescription: A paranormal expert and his daughter bunk in an abandoned house populated by 3 mischievous ghosts and one friendly one.

movies.title: Casper Meets Wendy
movies.shortDescription: Casper, a ghost, teams up with Wendy, a witch, against an evil warlock.

movies.title: Cat and the Hat
movies.shortDescription: Sally and Conrad are two bored kids whose life is turned up-side-down when a talking cat comes to visit them.

movies.title: Catch That Kid
movies.shortDescription: A girl and her two friends raid a bank, looking for the money needed for financing the cure of her dying father.

movies.title: Charlottes Web
movies.shortDescription: Wilbur the pig is scared of the end of the season, because he knows that come that time, he will end up on the dinner table. He hatches a plan with Charlotte, a spider that lives in his pen, to ensure that this will never happen.

movies.title: Chicken Little
movies.shortDescription: After ruining his reputation with the town, a courageous chicken must come to the rescue of his fellow citizens when aliens start an invasion.

movies.title: Chicken Run
movies.shortDescription: Chicken Run is a comedy escape drama with a touch of passion set on a sinister Yorkshire chicken farm in 1950s England.

movies.title: Chronicles of Narnia: the Lion, the Witch, and the Wardrobe
movies.shortDescription: Four kids travel through a wardrobe to the land of Narnia and learn of their destiny to free it with the guidance of a mystical lion.

movies.title: Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian
movies.shortDescription: Chronicles of Narnia

movies.title: Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
movies.shortDescription: Lucy and Edmund Pevensie return to Narnia with their cousin Eustace where they meet up with Prince Caspian for a trip across the sea aboard the royal ship The Dawn Treader. Along the way they encounter dragons, dwarves, merfolk, and a band of lost warriors before reaching the edge of the world.

movies.title: Cinderella
movies.shortDescription: When Cinderellas cruel stepmother prevents her from attending the Royal Ball, she gets some unexpected help from the lovable mice Gus and Jaq, and from her Fairy Godmother.

movies.title: Cinderella 2: Dreams Come True
movies.shortDescription: Jacques and Gus tell the story of how Cinderella becomes a princess but loses touch with herself.

movies.title: Cinderella 3: A Twist in Time
movies.shortDescription: Lady Tremaine gets her hands on the Fairy Godmothers wand, then turns back time to the day Cinderella tried on the glass slipper. She enlarges the slipper to fit one of the stepsisters, Anastasia, then erases Prince Charmings memories of meeting Cinderella. Now, Cinderella must foil Lady Tremaines scheme and win back her prince.

movies.title: Cinderella Story
movies.shortDescription: Routinely exploited by her wicked stepmother, the downtrodden Sam Montgomery is excited about the prospect of meeting her Internet beau at the schools Halloween dance.

movies.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs
movies.shortDescription: The most delicious event since macaroni met cheese. Inspired by the beloved childrens book, the film focuses on a town where food falls from the sky like rain.

movies.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs 2
movies.shortDescription: Flint Lockwood now works at The Live Corp Company for his idol Chester V. But hes forced to leave his post when he learns that his most infamous machine is still operational and is churning out menacing food-animal hybrids.

movies.title: Croods
movies.shortDescription: After their cave is destroyed, a caveman family must trek through an unfamiliar fantastical world with the help of an inventive boy.

movies.title: Curious George Movie
movies.shortDescription: Will Ferrell stars as The Man in the Yellow Hat, a gentleman who looks after his pet monkey - an inquisitive and wonderful creature whose enthusiasm often gets the best of him.

movies.title: Curious George: Boo Fest
movies.shortDescription: Get ready for a spook-tacular good time with Curious George - in his first-ever Halloween movie. This fun-filled adventure is a bewitching treat for the whole family!

movies.title: Curious George: Ice Station Monkey
movies.shortDescription: George and the Man with the Yellow Hat are having a blast on their research assignment in the Antarctic! / George and Bill run out of carrots while feeding the rabbits.

movies.title: Curious George Swings Into Spring
movies.shortDescription: Out in the country, George tries to cheer up a homesick Hundley by giving him a case of spring fever.

movies.title: Delgo
movies.shortDescription: Delgo, an adventurous but naive teenager, must rally his group of friends to protect their world from conflict between the Lockni and Nohrin people.

movies.title: Despicable Me
movies.shortDescription: When a criminal mastermind uses a trio of orphan girls as pawns for a grand scheme, he finds their love is profoundly changing him for the better.

movies.title: Despicable Me 2
movies.shortDescription: When Gru, the worlds most super-bad turned super-dad has been recruited by a team of officials to stop lethal muscle and a host of Grus own, He has to fight back with new gadgetry, cars, and more minion madness.

movies.title: Dinosaur
movies.shortDescription: An orphaned dinosaur raised by lemurs joins an arduous trek to a sancturary after a meteorite shower destroys his family home.

movies.title: DinoTime
movies.shortDescription: Three kids who travel back in time to 65 million years ago, where they are taken in by a dinosaur.

movies.title: Dog Who Saved Easter
movies.shortDescription: Its Easter and everyones favorite K-9 is back! The Bannisters are heading out on a family cruise and sending Zeus to doggie day care. Everything is going according to plan until the daycares crosstown rival hires a trio of crooks to sabotage the fledgling business. Zeus will make some new friends and new enemies as he uses all his tricks to save the daycare and Easter!

movies.title: Dragon Hunters
movies.shortDescription: A fantastic tale telling the adventures of two dragon hunters!

movies.title: Duck Tales the Movie: Treasure of the Lost Lamp
movies.shortDescription: Scrooge McDuck searches for a magic lamp that holds a genie. But an evil wizard is after it too.

movies.title: Dumbo
movies.shortDescription: Ridiculed because of his enormous ears, a young circus elephant is assisted by a mouse to achieve his full potential.

movies.title: Emperors New Groove
movies.shortDescription: Emperor Kuzco is turned into a llama by his ex-administrator Yzma, and must now regain his throne with the help of Pacha, the gentle llama herder.

movies.title: Epic
movies.shortDescription: A teenager finds herself transported to a deep forest setting where a battle between the forces of good and the forces of evil is taking place. She bands together with a rag-tag group of characters in order to save their world -- and ours.

movies.title: Escape From Planet Earth
movies.shortDescription: Astronaut Scorch Supernova finds himself caught in a trap when he responds to an SOS from a notoriously dangerous alien planet.

movies.title: Fantasia 2000
movies.shortDescription: An update of the original film with new interpretations of great works of classical music.

movies.title: Finding Nemo
movies.shortDescription: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

movies.title: Flushed Away
movies.shortDescription: The story of an uptown rat that gets flushed down the toilet from his penthouse apartment, ending in the sewers of London, where he has to learn a whole new and different way of life.

movies.title: Fox and The Hound
movies.shortDescription: Two childhood friends find themselves forced to become enemies.

movies.title: Fox and The Hound 2
movies.shortDescription: In this prequel to The Fox and the Hound (1981), Copper the dog, here still just a pup, joins a canine music band and spends less and less time with his best friend Todd the fox. Is their friendship in danger?

movies.title: Frankenweenie
movies.shortDescription: Young Victor conducts a science experiment to bring his beloved dog Sparky back to life, only to face unintended, sometimes monstrous, consequences.

movies.title: Freaky Friday
movies.shortDescription: An overworked mother and her daughter do not get along. When they switch bodies, each is forced to adapt to the others life for one freaky Friday.

movies.title: Freddy Frogface
movies.shortDescription: Life isnt easy for young Victor, who not only has to face a world full of stern grown-ups but also the town bully Freddy Frogface.

movies.title: Free Birds
movies.shortDescription: Two turkeys from opposite sides of the tracks must put aside their differences and team up to travel back in time to change the course of history - and get turkey off the holiday menu for good.

movies.title: Free Willy
movies.shortDescription: When a boy learns that a beloved killer whale is to be killed by the aquarium owners, the boy risks everything to free the whale.

movies.title: Frozen

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.shortDescription: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in an attempt to ensure humanitys survival.

movies.title: In time
movies.shortDescription: In a future where people stop aging at 25, but are engineered to live only one more year, having the means to buy your way out of the situation is a shot at immortal youth. Here, Will Salas finds himself accused of murder and on the run with a hostage - a connection that becomes an important part of the way against the system.

movies.title: iRobot
movies.shortDescription: In 2035 a technophobic cop investigates a crime that may have been perpetrated by a robot, which leads to a larger threat to humanity.

movies.title: Iron Man
movies.shortDescription: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, an industrialist creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight against evil. This leads him to conflict within his own company.

movies.title: Iron Man 2
movies.shortDescription: With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his fathers legacy.

movies.title: Iron Man 3
movies.shortDescription: When Tony Starks world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.

movies.title: Judge Dredd
movies.shortDescription: In a dystopian future, Joseph Dredd, the most famous Judge (a police officer with instant field judiciary powers) is convicted for a crime he did not commit while his murderous counterpart escapes.

movies.title: Jurassic Park
movies.shortDescription: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

movies.title: Jurassic Park 2: The Lost World
movies.shortDescription: A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there while another team approaches with another agenda.

movies.title: Jurassic Park 3
movies.shortDescription: A decidedly odd couple with ulterior motives convince Dr. Alan Grant to go to Isla Sorna (the second InGen dinosaur lab.), resulting in an unexpected landing...and unexpected new inhabitants on the island.

movies.title: Johnny Mnemonic
movies.shortDescription: A data courier, literally carrying a data package inside his head, must deliver it before he dies from the burden or is killed by the Yakuza.

movies.title: Lost Time
movies.shortDescription: After leaving a doctor visit with the worst news, Valerie Dreyfuss and her sister Melissa come to a stop on a lonely stretch of road. Their car is engulfed by a blinding light....12 hours later Valerie wakes to the horror that her sister is gone, nowhere to be found.

movies.title: Lawnmower Man
movies.shortDescription: A simple man is turned into a genius through the application of computer science.

movies.title: Land of the Lost
movies.shortDescription: On his latest expedition, Dr. Rick Marshall is sucked into a space-time vortex alongside his research assistant and a redneck survivalist. In this alternate universe, the trio make friends with a primate named Chaka, their only ally in a world full of dinosaurs and other fantastic creatures.

movies.title: Looper
movies.shortDescription: In 2074, when the mob wants to get rid of someone, the target is sent into the past, where a hired gun awaits someone like Joe who one day learns the mob wants to close the loop by sending back Joes future self for assassination.

movies.title: Last Days on Mars
movies.shortDescription: A group of astronaut explorers succumb one by one to a mysterious and terrifying force while collecting specimens on Mars.

movies.title: Mysterious Island
movies.shortDescription: To escape evils of the Civil war, Cyrus removes his small family and random war prisoners by way if hot air balloon. Once landing on an island the group finds they are surrounded by danger

movies.title: Men in Black
movies.shortDescription: A streetwise NYPD detective joins a secret organization that polices extraterrestrial affairs on Earth.

movies.title: Men in Black 2
movies.shortDescription: Agent J needs help so he is sent to find Agent K and restore his memory.

movies.title: Mary Shelleys Frankenstein
movies.shortDescription: When Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man he just created, the monster escapes and later swears revenge.

movies.title: The Maze Runner
movies.shortDescription: Thomas is deposited in a community of boys after his memory is erased, soon learning theyre all trapped in a maze that will require him to join forces with fellow runners for a shot at escape.

movies.title: Vice
movies.shortDescription: Bruce Willis stars in this Sci-Fi thriller about ultimate resort: VICE, where customers can play out their wildest fantasies with artificial inhabitants who look like humans.

movies.title: The Net
movies.shortDescription: A computer programmer stumbles upon a conspiracy, putting her life and the lives of those around her in great danger.

movies.title: Oblivion
movies.shortDescription: A veteran assigned to extract Earths remaining resources begins to question what he knows about his mission and himself.

movies.title: Predator
movies.shortDescription: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

movies.title: Predator 2
movies.shortDescription: Amidst a territorial gang war, a sophisticated alien hunter stalks the citizens of Los Angeles and the only man between him and his prey is veteran L.A.P.D. officer, Lieutenant Mike Harrigan.

movies.title: Predators
movies.shortDescription: A group of elite warriors are hunted by members of a merciless alien race known as Predators.

movies.title: Pacific Rim
movies.shortDescription: As a war between humankind and monstrous sea creatures wages on, a former pilot and a trainee are paired up to drive a seemingly obsolete special weapon in a desperate effort to save the world from the apocalypse.

movies.title: Prometheus
movies.shortDescription: Following clues to the origin of mankind a team journey across the universe and find a structure on a distant planet containing a monolithic statue of a humanoid head and stone cylinders of alien blood but they soon find they are not alone.

movies.title: Planet of the Apes (1)
movies.shortDescription: An astronaut crew crash lands on a planet in the distant future where intelligent talking apes are the dominant species, and humans are the oppressed and enslaved.

movies.title: Planet of the Apes (2): Beneath the Planet of the Apes
movies.shortDescription: The sole survivor of an interplanetary rescue mission searches for the only survivor of the previous expedition. He discovers a planet ruled by apes and an underground city run by telepathic humans.

movies.title: Planet of the Apes (3): Escape from the Planet of the Apes
movies.shortDescription: The world is shocked by the appearance of two talking chimpanzees, who arrived mysteriously in a U.S. spacecraft. They become the toast of society; but one man believes them to be a threat to the human race.

movies.title: Planet of the Apes (4): Conquest of the Planet of the Apes
movies.shortDescription: In a futuristic world that has embraced ape slavery, Caesar, the son of the late simians Cornelius and Zira, surfaces after almost twenty years of hiding out from the authorities, and prepares for a slave revolt against humanity.

movies.title: Planet of the Apes (5): Battle for the Planet of the Apes
movies.shortDescription: Ten years after conquering the Earth, ape leader Caesar wants the ruling apes and enslaved humans to live in peace. But warring factions of apes led by a militant gorilla general as well as various human groups threaten the stability.

movies.title: Planet of the Apes
movies.shortDescription: An Air Force astronaut crash lands on a mysterious planet where evolved, talking apes dominate a race of primitive humans.

movies.title: Planet of the Apes (A): Rise of the Planet of the Apes
movies.shortDescription: A substance, designed to help the brain repair itself, gives rise to a super intelligent chimp who leads an ape uprising.

movies.title: Planet of the Apes (B): Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
movies.shortDescription: Ten years after a pandemic disease, apes who have survived it are drawn into battle with a group of human survivors.

movies.title: The Running Man
movies.shortDescription: A wrongly convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a game show.

movies.title: Robocop
movies.shortDescription: In 2028 Detroit, when Alex Murphy a loving husband, father and good cop is critically injured in the line of duty, the multinational conglomerate OmniCorp sees their chance for a part-man, part robot police officer.

movies.title: Robocop
movies.shortDescription: In a dystopic and crime ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.

movies.title: Robocop 2
movies.shortDescription: A corrupt businesswoman seeks to discredit Robocop in favor of her own model of cyborg.

movies.title: Robocop 3
movies.shortDescription: Robocop saves the day once more. This time the half man/half robot takes on ruthless developers who want to evict some people on their land.

movies.title: Star Wars Episode 1: The Phantom Menace
movies.shortDescription: Two Jedi Knights escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to reclaim their old glory.

movies.title: Star Wars Episode 2: Attack of the Clones
movies.shortDescription: Ten years after initially meeting, Anakin Skywalker shares a forbidden romance with Padme, while Obi Wan investigates an assassination attempt on the Senator and discovers a secret clone army crafted for the Jedi.

movies.title: Star Wars Episode 3: Revenge of the Sith
movies.shortDescription: As the Clone Wars near an end, the Sith Lord Darth Sidious steps out of the shadows, at which time Anakin succumbs to his emotions, becoming Darth Vader and putting his relationships with Obi Wan and Padme at risk.

movies.title: Star Wars Episode 4: A New Hope
movies.shortDescription: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a wookiee and two droids to save the universe from the Empires world destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader.

movies.title: Star Wars Episode 5: The Empire Strikes Back
movies.shortDescription: After the rebels have been brutally overpowered by the Empire on their newly established base, Luke Skywalker takes advanced Jedi training with Master Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader as part of his plan to capture Luke.

movies.title: Star Wars Episode 6: Return of the Jedi
movies.shortDescription: After rescuing Han Solo from the palace of Jabba the Hutt, the rebels attempt to destroy the second Death Star, while Luke struggles to make Vader shake off of the dark side of the Force.

movies.title: The 6th Day
movies.shortDescription: Futuristic action about a man who meets a clone of himself and stumbles into a grand conspiracy about clones taking over the world.

movies.title: Short Circuit
movies.shortDescription: Number 5 of a group of experimental robots in a lab is electrocuted, suddenly becomes intelligent, and escapes.

movies.title: Skyline
movies.shortDescription: Strange lights descend on the city of Los Angeles, drawing people outside like moths to a flame where an extraterrestrial force threatens to swallow the entire human population off the face of the Earth.

movies.title: Stargate
movies.shortDescription: An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.

movies.title: Star Trek: First Contact
movies.shortDescription: Captain Picard and his crew pursue the Borg back in time to stop them from preventing Earths first contact with an alien species. They also make sure that Zefram Cochrane makes his famous maiden flight at warp speed.

movies.title: Star Trek: Generations
movies.shortDescription: Captain Picard, with the help of supposedly dead Captain Kirk, must stop a madman willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter an energy ribbon.

movies.title: Star Trek: Insurrection
movies.shortDescription: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of a Federation conspiracy against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Captain Picard begins an open rebellion.

movies.title: Star Trek: Nemesis
movies.shortDescription: After the Enterprise is diverted to the Romulan homeworld Romulus, supposedly because they want to negotiate a peace treaty, the Federation soon find out the Romulans are planning an attack on Earth.

movies.title: Star Trek (1)
movies.shortDescription: The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his fathers legacy with Mr. Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful, time traveling Romulan creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time.

movies.title: Star Trek (2): Into Darkness
movies.shortDescription: After the crew of the Enterprise find an unstoppable force of terror from within their own organization, Captain Kirk leads a manhunt to a war zone world to capture a one man weapon of mass destruction.

movies.title: Serenity
movies.shortDescription: The crew of the ship Serenity tries to evade an assassin sent to recapture one of their number who is telepathic.

movies.title: Signal
movies.shortDescription: On a road trip, Nic and two friends are drawn to an isolated area by a computer genius. When everything suddenly goes dark, Nic regains consciousness only to find himself in a waking nightmare.

movies.title: Terminator
movies.shortDescription: A human looking indestructible cyborg is sent from 2029 to 1984 to assassinate a waitress, whose unborn son will lead humanity in a war against the machines, while a soldier from that war is sent to protect her at all costs.

movies.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
movies.shortDescription: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her young son, John Connor, from a more advanced cyborg, made out of liquid metal.

movies.title: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines
movies.shortDescription: A cybernetic warrior from a post apocalyptic future travels back in time to protect a 19 year old drifter and his future wife from a most advanced robotic assassin and to ensure they both survive a nuclear attack.

movies.title: Terminator 4: Salvation
movies.shortDescription: In 2018, a mysterious new weapon in the war against the machines, half human and half machine, comes to John Connor on the eve of a resistance attack on Skynet. But whose side is he on, and can he be trusted?

movies.title: Total Recall
movies.shortDescription: When a man goes for virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real, or does he?

movies.title: Total Recall
movies.shortDescription: A factory worker, Douglas Quaid, begins to suspect that he is a spy after visiting Rekall a company that provides its clients with implanted fake memories of a life they would like to have led goes wrong and he finds himself on the run.

movies.title: Transformers
movies.shortDescription: An ancient struggle between two Cybertronian races, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, comes to Earth, with a clue to the ultimate power held by a teenager.

movies.title: Transformers 2: Revenge of the Fallen
movies.shortDescription: Sam Witwicky leaves the Autobots behind for a normal life. But when his mind is filled with cryptic symbols, the Decepticons target him and he is dragged back into the Transformers war.

movies.title: Transformers 3: Dark of the Moon
movies.shortDescription: The Autobots learn of a Cybertronian spacecraft hidden on the moon, and race against the Decepticons to reach it and to learn its secrets.

movies.title: Transformers 4: Age of Extinction
movies.shortDescription: Autobots must escape sight from a bounty hunter who takes control of the human serendipity: Unexpectedly, Optimus Prime and his remaining gang turn to a mechanic and his daughter for help.

movies.title: Twelve Monkeys
movies.shortDescription: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

movies.title: 28 Days Later
movies.shortDescription: Four weeks after a mysterious, incurable virus spreads throughout the UK, a handful of survivors try to find sanctuary.

movies.title: Tron: Legacy
movies.shortDescription: The son of a virtual world designer goes looking for his father and ends up inside the digital world that his father designed. He meets his fathers corrupted creation and a unique ally who was born inside the digital world.

movies.title: Predestination
movies.shortDescription: The life of a time traveling Temporal Agent. On his final assignment, he must pursue the one criminal that has eluded him throughout time.

movies.title: War of the Worlds
movies.shortDescription: As Earth is invaded by alien tripod fighting machines, one family fights for survival.

movies.title: Robot Revolution
movies.shortDescription: In a not too distant future where every aspect of society is controlled by machines, terrorism has forced the state to institute martial law. While performing a routine check in a high rise apartment, a well armed police officer and her android partner discover that something is causing the buildings residents to malfunction, forcing them to fight their way out. However, as they investigate the malfunction further, they uncover a secret that the government would do anything to cover up.

movies.title: Monsters
movies.shortDescription: Six years after Earth has suffered an alien invasion a cynical journalist agrees to escort a shaken American tourist through an infected zone in Mexico to the safety of the US border.

movies.title: Monsters 2: Dark Continent
movies.shortDescription: Ten years on from the events of Monsters, and the Infected Zones have now spread worldwide. In the Middle East a new insurgency has begun. At the same time there has also been a proliferation of Monsters in that region. The Army decide to draft in more numbers to help deal with this insurgency.

movies.title: Jupiter Ascending
movies.shortDescription: A young woman discovers her destiny as an heiress of intergalactic nobility and must fight to protect the inhabitants of Earth from an ancient and destructive industry

movies.title: High Moon
movies.shortDescription: TV Pilot: Set in the future where the countries of Earth have established colonies to mine the Moons resources. When a new life form is discovered, chaos erupts as various factions race to uncover and exploit its powerful secrets.

movies.title: I Am Legend
movies.shortDescription: Years after a plague kills most of humanity and transforms the rest into monsters, the sole survivor in New York City struggles valiantly to find a cure.

movies.title: Battle For Skyark
movies.shortDescription: In the near future the earth has become desolate and dangerous. Now inhabited by by a mysterious race of creatures, humanity has been forced to find refuge in the SkyArk, a man made city in the sky. As the population grows, space becomes scarce and only the rich and powerful can stay, dumping the poor and orphaned of SkyArk to the abandoned earth. Among them is one boy, Rags, the son of a fallen commander who is determined to save his fellow orphans and exiles. Together with his friends, he must battle through the ruins of old earth, fighting off the horde of alien monsters to return to SkyArk and bring peace back to the people.

movies.title: Infini
movies.shortDescription: An elite search and rescue team transport onto an off world mining facility to rescue Whit Carmichael, the lone survivor of a biological outbreak.

movies.title: Ex Machina
movies.shortDescription: A young programmer is selected to participate in a breakthrough experiment in artificial intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a breathtaking female A.I.

movies.title: Chappie
movies.shortDescription: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force. When one police droid, Chappie, is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself.

movies.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
movies.shortDescription: In a stark desert landscape where humanity is broken, two rebels just might be able to restore order. Max, a man of action and of few words, and Furiosa, a woman of action who is looking to make it back to her childhood homeland.

movies.title: Jurassic World
movies.shortDescription: A new theme park is built on the original site of Jurassic Park. Everything is going well until the parks newest attraction, a genetically modified giant stealth killing machine, escapes containment and goes on a killing spree.

movies.title: Terminator Genisys
movies.shortDescription: John Connor sends Kyle Reese back in time to protect Sarah Connor, but when he arrives in 1984, nothing is as he expected it to be.

movies.title: Star Trek Renegades
movies.shortDescription: It is nearly ten years after Voyagers return from the Delta Quadrant, and the Federation is in a crisis. The Federations main suppliers of dilithium crystals are disappearing. Space and time have folded around several planets, effectively isolating them from any contact with outside worlds. And this phenomenon is not natural; someone or something is causing this to happen.

movies.title: Another World
movies.shortDescription: In a post apocalyptic future, a biological warfare program gone wrong leaves only four survivors defending themselves from the infected, mindless killers. As they struggle to survive and make sense of what is happening, they find another survivor, intent on revealing the truth.

movies.title: Maze Runner the Scorch Trials
movies.shortDescription: After having escaped the Maze, the Gladers now face a new set of challenges on the open roads of a desolate landscape filled with unimaginable obstacles.

movies.title: Star Wars Episode 7: The Force Awakens
movies.shortDescription: Three decades after the defeat of the Galactic Empire, a new threat arises. The First Order attempts to rule the galaxy and only a ragtag group of heroes can stop them, along with the help of the Resistance.

movies.title: Cell
movies.shortDescription: When a mysterious cell phone signal causes apocalyptic chaos, an artist is determined to reunite with his young son in New England.

movies.title: Deadpool
movies.shortDescription: A former Special Forces operative turned mercenary is subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers, adopting the alter ego Deadpool.

movies.title: Starship Troopers
movies.shortDescription: Humans in a fascistic, militaristic future do battle with giant alien bugs in a fight for survival.

movies.title: Starship Troopers 2
movies.shortDescription: In the sequel to Paul Verhoevens loved/reviled scifi film, a group of troopers taking refuge in an abandoned outpost after fighting alien bugs, failing to realize that more danger lays in wait.

movies.title: Starship Troopers 3
movies.shortDescription: Johnny Rico is called back into action to defeat the bugs.

movies.title: Starship Troopers Invasion
movies.shortDescription: On an asteroid, the Terran Federations Fort Casey is on top of a bug hive. The Starship Alesia begins to deploy its troops to seize and control the hanger and rescue any survivors.

movies.title: 5th Wave
movies.shortDescription: Four waves of increasingly deadly alien attacks have left most of Earth decimated. Cassie is on the run, desperately trying to save her younger brother.

movies.title: Divergent (3): Allegiant
movies.shortDescription: After the earth-shattering revelations of Insurgent, Tris must escape with Four beyond the wall that encircles Chicago, to finally discover the shocking truth of the world around them.

movies.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
movies.shortDescription: After getting in a car accident, a woman is held in a shelter with two men, who claim the outside world is affected by a widespread chemical attack.

movies.title: Independence Day 2
movies.shortDescription: Two decades after the first Independence Day invasion, Earth is faced with a new extra Solar threat. But will mankinds new space defenses be enough?

movies.title: Star Trek Beyond
movies.shortDescription: The USS Enterprise crew explores the furthest reaches of uncharted space, where they encounter a new ruthless enemy who puts them and everything the Federation stands for to the test.

movies.title: Midnight Special
movies.shortDescription: A father and son go on the run, pursued by the government and a cult drawn to the childs special powers.

movies.title: The Thinning
movies.shortDescription: Set in a future society where standardized tests determine whether students literally live or die, the movie follows two students (Logan Paul and Peyton List) as discover the test is smoke and mirrors hiding a larger conspiracy and must fight the system to expose it and take it down.

movies.title: Short Circuit 2
movies.shortDescription: Robot Johnny Five comes to the city and gets manipulated by criminals who want him for their own purposes.

movies.title: Spectral
movies.shortDescription: A sci-fi/thriller story centered on a special-ops team that is dispatched to fight supernatural beings.

movies.title: Trolls
movies.shortDescription: After the Bergens invade Troll Village, Poppy, the happiest Troll ever born, and the curmudgeonly Branch set off on a journey to rescue her friends.

movies.title: Arrival
movies.shortDescription: When twelve mysterious spacecraft appear around the world, linguistics professor Louise Banks is tasked with interpreting the language of the apparent alien visitors.

movies.title: Passengers
movies.shortDescription: A spacecraft traveling to a distant colony planet and transporting thousands of people has a malfunction in its sleep chambers. As a result, two passengers are awakened 90 years early.

movies.title: Star Wars: Rogue One
movies.shortDescription: The Rebel Alliance makes a risky move to steal the plans for the Death Star, setting up the epic saga to follow.

movies.title: Rollerball
movies.shortDescription: The big thing in 2005 is a violent sport which can have some pretty serious consequences... like dying.

movies.title: Ghost In the Shell
movies.shortDescription: In the near future, Major is the first of her kind: A human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals.

movies.title: Life
movies.shortDescription: A team of scientists aboard the International Space Station discover a rapidly evolving life form, that caused extinction on Mars, and now threatens the crew and all life on Earth.

movies.title: What Happened To Monday
movies.shortDescription: In a world where families are limited to one child due to overpopulation, a set of identical septuplets must avoid being put to a long sleep by the government and dangerous infighting while investigating the disappearance of one of their own.

movies.title: Anti Matter
movies.shortDescription: Anti Matter (AKA Worm) is a sci-fi noir take on the Alice in Wonderland tale. Ana, an Oxford PhD student, finds herself unable to build new memories following an experiment to generate and travel through a wormhole. The story follows her increasingly desperate efforts to understand what happened.

movies.title: Transformers 5: The Last Knight
movies.shortDescription: Autobots and Decepticons are at war, with humans on the sidelines. Optimus Prime is gone. The key to saving our future lies buried in the secrets of the past, in the hidden history of Transformers on Earth.

movies.title: Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets
movies.shortDescription: A dark force threatens Alpha, a vast metropolis and home to species from a thousand planets. Special operatives Valerian and Laureline must race to identify the marauding menace and safeguard not just Alpha, but the future of the universe.

movies.title: Beyond Skyline
movies.shortDescription: A tough-as-nails detective embarks on a relentless pursuit to free his son from a nightmarish alien warship.

movies.title: Blade Runner: 2049
movies.shortDescription: A young blade runners discovery of a long buried secret leads him to track down former blade runner Rick Deckard, whos been missing for thirty years.

movies.title: Flatliners
movies.shortDescription: Five medical students, obsessed by what lies beyond the confines of life, embark on a daring experiment by stopping their hearts for short periods, each triggers a near death experience - giving them a firsthand account of the afterlife.

movies.title: Star Wars 8: The Last Jedi
movies.shortDescription: Rey develops her newly discovered abilities with the guidance of Luke Skywalker, who is unsettled by the strength of her powers. Meanwhile, the Resistance prepares for battle with the First Order.

movies.title: Ready Player One
movies.shortDescription: When the creator of a virtual reality world called the OASIS dies, he releases a video in which he challenges all OASIS users to find his Easter Egg, which will give the finder his fortune.
